computeMatrix reference-point --referencePoint center -S CON-1and2-merged-scaled.bw SUB-1and2-merged-scaled.bw Mt-gDNA-ScaledForDoubleBigwig.bw -R /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/MT-UpInSUB-Pval.bed -a 1000 -b 1000 -o UpInSUB-pval.gz;

mkdir NearestGenes;

cd NearestGenes;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results; 

R
Dist <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/NearestGenes/MT-UpInSUB-Pval-Distances.txt", header = F, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
val <- Dist$V1
hist(val , breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("MTR DownInSUB THS Sizes"), xlab = "bp")
dev.copy(png,'UpInSUBdistances.png')
dev.off()
valcuts <- val[val > -2000 ]
valcuts2 <- valcuts[valcuts < 500 ]
hist(valcuts2 , xlim=c(-4000,4000), breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("MTR DownInSUB THS Sizes"), xlab = "bp")

UpInSUB <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/NearestGenes/MT-UpInSUB-Pval.tss.bed", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 

#TestingStuff
bahahha <- subset(UpInSUB, Distance>-3000 & Distance<500, select=c(Distance))
mm1 <- as.matrix(bahahha)
mm2 <- matrix(mm1, ncol = ncol(bahahha), dimnames = NULL)
hist(mm2 , xlim=c(-4000,1000), breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("MTR DownInSUB THS Sizes"), xlab = "bp")

Nearest <- subset(UpInSUB, Distance>-3000 & Distance<500, select=c(ClosestTSS_ID))
test <- as.matrix(Nearest)
mm2 <- matrix(test, ncol = ncol(Nearest), dimnames = NULL)
write.table(mm2, file="/Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/NearestGenes/Mtr-UpInSUB-Genes-3Kto500.txt", row.names=FALSE, quote=FALSE, col.names=FALSE, sep="\t")

RealNearest <- subset(UpInSUB, Distance>-2000 & Distance<100, select=c(ClosestTSS_ID))
test <- as.matrix(RealNearest)
mm2 <- matrix(test, ncol = ncol(RealNearest), dimnames = NULL)
write.table(mm2, file="/Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/NearestGenes/Mtr-UpInSUB-Genes-2Kto100.txt", row.names=FALSE, quote=FALSE, col.names=FALSE, sep="\t")

awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.tss.bed > SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-ROOT-DownInSUB.tss.bed > SL-ROOT-DownInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SP-SHOOT-All.tss.bed > SP-SHOOT-All-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-HAIRY-All.tss.bed > SL-HAIRY-All-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-ROOT-UpInSUB.tss.bed > SL-ROOT-UpInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB.tss.bed > SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB.tss.bed > SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SP-ROOT-All.tss.bed > SP-ROOT-All-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB.tss.bed > SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB.tss.bed > SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SP-ROOT-DownInSUB.tss.bed > SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB.tss.bed > SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB.tss.bed > SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB-Distances.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SL-SHOOT-All.tss.bed > SL-SHOOT-All-Distances.bed; 
mkdir Distances;
mv *Distances.bed Distances; 
mkdir Genes; 
mv *Genes.bed Genes;

All of these sequences have already been centered to 300bp
Now, to merge, may have some errors because of (-) coords, and then to get sequences from these
Sort first, then merge

bedtools sort -i MT-UpInSUB-Pval.bed > sorted.bed
Error: malformed BED entry at line 19003. Start Coordinate detected that is < 0. Exiting.
bedtools sort -i TookOutNeg.bed > sorted.bed; 
bedtools merge -d -150 -i sorted.bed > Testing.bed; 


bedtools sort -i MT-DownInSUB-Pval.bed > MT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-dashed.bed > SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i MT-UpInSUB-Pval.bed > MT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB-dashed.bed > SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i OS-DownInSUB-pval.bed > OS-DownInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB-dashed.bed > SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i OS-UpInSUB-pval.bed > OS-UpInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB.bed > SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB.bed > SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-ROOT-DownInSUB.bed > SL-ROOT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > SL-ROOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB.bed > SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB.bed > SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-dashed.bed > SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-dashed-sorted.bed; 

mv *sorted.bed BedsSRTD; 

cd BedsSRTD; 


bedtools merge -d -150 -i MT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed > MT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed > SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i MT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed > MT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed > SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i OS-DownInSUB-sorted.bed > OS-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed > SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i OS-UpInSUB-sorted.bed > OS-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB-sorted.bed > SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB-sorted.bed > SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SL-ROOT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed > SL-ROOT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SL-ROOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed > SL-ROOT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB-sorted.bed > SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB-sorted.bed > SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed;  
bedtools merge -d -150 -i SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-dashed-sorted.bed > SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed; 


bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed -fo MT-UpInSUB-m50p-SEQ.txt;  
bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed -fo MT-DownInSUB-m50p-SEQ.txt;  
bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa -bed OS-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed -fo OS-UpInSUB-m50p-SEQ.txt;

Get counts for Rice and Medicago with the setup of -250 to +50 around the TSS for every gene
Start finalizing all the information that you have

Create the bed file and then just do counting similar to before
In the EVAL, do NOT forget to scale everything correctly

htseq-count -m union -s no -i gene_id -t exon -f bam Mt_ATAC_C1.sorted.q2.bam Mt-CON-and-SUB-mD150rR1-p50INT-UNSCALED.gff3 > MT-CON-1-unscaled-counts.txt; 


Used the tss.switch type file for starting the ID. Have to keep in mind that by going 250 back and 50 forward may create errors (such as a - coord if the gene started at the beginning of the chromosome)
Also, knowing which direction the gene is transcribed is hugely important

Also also, I am a genius. The coordinates are provided for where to count BUT the gene_id is equivalent to not just these coordinates but also the Gene Name, SO SMART!

cd /Volumes/Deal-5TB/SUBEXP-ATAC/Medicago/BAMs; 

htseq-count -m union -s no -i gene_id -t exon -f bam Mt_ATAC_C1.sorted.q2.bam MTR-TSScounting.gff3 > MT-CON-1-unscaled-TSScounts.txt; 
htseq-count -m union -s no -i gene_id -t exon -f bam Mt_ATAC_C2.sorted.q2.bam MTR-TSScounting.gff3 > MT-CON-2-unscaled-TSScounts.txt; 
htseq-count -m union -s no -i gene_id -t exon -f bam CON-7.sorted.Q2.bam MTR-TSScounting.gff3 > MT-CON-3-unscaled-TSScounts.txt; 
htseq-count -m union -s no -i gene_id -t exon -f bam Mt_ATAC_S1.sorted.q2.bam MTR-TSScounting.gff3 > MT-SUB-1-unscaled-TSScounts.txt; 
htseq-count -m union -s no -i gene_id -t exon -f bam Mt_ATAC_S2.sorted.q2.bam MTR-TSScounting.gff3 > MT-SUB-2-unscaled-TSScounts.txt; 
htseq-count -m union -s no -i gene_id -t exon -f bam SUB-7.sorted.Q2.bam MTR-TSScounting.gff3 > MT-SUB-3-unscaled-TSScounts.txt;

mv *TSScounts.txt /Volumes/Deal-5TB/SUBEXP-ATAC/Medicago/TSScounting;

Had To Fix the MTupGenes so that the coordinates are 300 bp sized

bedtools sort -i MTupGenes-NearestTHS-COORDS.txt | bedtools merge -d -150 > MTupGenes-NearestTHS-COORDS-mergedm150.bed; 

So, now after the merging I resize to 300bp again, but apparently this isn't necessary for MEME-ChIP anymore because I was able to run it with different sized sequences

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MTupGenes-NearestTHS-COORDS-mergedm150.bed -fo MTupgenes-NearestTHS-seqs.txt;

wc -l SH2-motif-MT-coords.bed; 

32690 SH2-motif-MT-coords.bed

mkdir SH2-motifs-NearestTSS; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p SH2-motif-MT-coords.bed -a MTR4_TSS.col.switch.bed -o SH2-motifs-NearestTSS; 
cd SH2-motifs-NearestTSS; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' SH2-motif-MT-coords.tss.bed > SH2-motif-MT-coords-Distances.bed; 

R

SH2_MT_Dist <- read.table("SH2-motif-MT-coords-Distances.bed", header = F, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 

SH2_MT <- SH2_MT_Dist$V1

hist(SH2_MT,breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("SH2 Motifs in Medicago Distances To TSS"), xlab = "bp")
dev.copy(png,'SH2-MT-Motifs-Distances-To-TSS.png')
dev.off()

dev.off()

AGL20_AGL14_MT_Dist <- read.table("AGL20-AGL14-motif-MT-coords-Distances.bed", header = F, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
AGL20_AGL14_MT <- AGL20_AGL14_MT_Dist$V1
hist(AGL20_AGL14_MT,breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("AGL20-AGL14 Motifs in Medicago Distances To TSS"), xlab = "bp")
dev.copy(png,'AGL20-AGL14-MT-Motifs-Distances-To-TSS.png')
dev.off()
hist(AGL20_AGL14_MT,breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("AGL20-AGL14 Motifs in Medicago Distances To TSS"), xlab = "bp", xlim=c(-10000,10000))
dev.copy(png,'AGL20-AGL14-MT-Zoomed-Motifs-Distances-To-TSS.png')
dev.off()

cd BHLH130-D-motifs-NearestTSS; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' BHLH130-D-motif-SL-coords.tss.bed > BHLH130-D-motif-SL-coords-Distances.bed; 
cp BHLH130-D-motif-SL-coords-Distances.bed /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/MotifSLResults/DistancePlots; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/MotifSLResults;

SH2_OS_Dist <- read.table("AGL20-AGL14-motif-OS-coords-Distances.bed", header = F, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
SH2_OS <- SH2_OS_Dist$V1
hist(SH2_OS,breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("AGL20-AGL14 Motifs in Rice Distances To TSS"), xlab = "bp")
dev.copy(png,'AGL20-AGL14-OS-Motifs-Distances-To-TSS.png')
dev.off()
hist(SH2_OS,breaks=4000, freq=NULL, main = paste("AGL20-AGL14 Motifs in Rice Distances To TSS"), xlab = "bp", xlim=c(-10000,10000))
dev.copy(png,'AGL20-AGL14-OS-Zoomed-Motifs-Distances-To-TSS.png')
dev.off()

mkdir All; 
mv *Zoomed* A-Zoomedd; 
mv *png All; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/MotifSPResults; 
cp *coords.bed /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/THSoverlapping/SP; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/MotifSLResults; 
cp *coords.bed /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/THSoverlapping/SL; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/MotifOSResults; 
cp *coords.bed /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/THSoverlapping/OS; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/MotifMTResults; 
cp *coords.bed /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/THSoverlapping/MT; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/THSoverlapping/SP; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a SH2-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > SH2-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AGL20-AGL14-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > AGL20-AGL14-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT1G47655-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > AT1G47655-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT2G28810-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > AT2G28810-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT3G57600-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > AT3G57600-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT4G18450-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > AT4G18450-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT4G28140-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > AT4G28140-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT5G65130-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > AT5G65130-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a BHLH122-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > BHLH122-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a BHLH130-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > BHLH130-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a BHLH80-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > BHLH80-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a BPC1-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > BPC1-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a BPC5-D-motif-SP-coords.bed -b SP-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed > BPC5-D-SP-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;

bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF11-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF11-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF115-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF115-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF115-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF115-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF15-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF15-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF15-ERF091-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF15-ERF091-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF2-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF2-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF2-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF2-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF5-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF5-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERF5-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > ERF5-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a FRS9-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > FRS9-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a NTM1-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > NTM1-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a OBP3-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > OBP3-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a REM19-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > REM19-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a SH2-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > SH2-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a SHN3-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > SHN3-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a VRN1-D-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > VRN1-D-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH128-bHLH129-FBH1-FBH2-FBH3-FBH4-motif-MT-coords.bed -b MT-UpInSUB-pval.bed > bHLH128-bHLH129-FBH1-FBH2-FBH3-FBH4-MT-UpInSUBTHS-Intersect.bed;

distances <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MOTIFoccurrences-MARandMB/MotifMTResults/DistancePlots/", header = F, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
colnames(distances) <- c("Distance")
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(distances, aes(x=Distance)) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlim(-100,100) + xlab("Distance from TSS")

dev.copy(png,'FRS9-D-SP-Zoomed-Motifs-Distances-To-TSS.png')
dev.off()

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt MT-UpInSUB-Pval-merged50p.tss.bed > MT-SURFgenes-WithUpInSUBths.bed; 

367 results

awk '($4 > -2000 ) ' MT-SURFgenes-WithUpInSUBths.bed | awk '($4 < 500)' > MT-SURFgenes-WithUpInSUBthsInPromoter-2000toplus500.bed; 

151 results

Grab the genes, remove redundancy, get sequence, analyze with AME

awk '{print $7}' MT-SURFgenes-WithUpInSUBthsInPromoter-2000toplus500.bed | awk '!x[$0]++' > MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-GENES.bed; 

81 results (no redundancy)

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Plus.txt MT-Genes.bed > MT-Plus-Genes.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Minus.txt MT-Genes.bed > MT-Minus-Genes.bed; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-GENES.bed MT-Plus-Genes.bed > MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-PLUS-GENECOORDINATES.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-GENES.bed MT-Minus-Genes.bed > MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-MINUS-GENECOORDINATES.bed; 

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-PLUS-GENECOORDINATES.bed > MT-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-MINUS-GENECOORDINATES.bed > MT-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt; 
cat MT-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt MT-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt > MT-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm MT-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; rm MT-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt;  
cat MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-PLUS-GENECOORDINATES.bed MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-nonredundant-MINUS-GENECOORDINATES.bed > MT-SURFgenes-NAapproach-GeneCoords.bed; 

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MT-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed -fo MT-SURFgenes-PromSEQS.txt; 




awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MT-SURFs-AccesProms-AME-CisBPmotifs.txt TF_Information.txt > MT-SURFs-AccesProms-AME-CisBPmotifs-MATCHES.txt; 


awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFs-AccesProms-AME-CisBPmotifs-ALTID.txt MT-SURFs-AccesProms-AME-CisBPmotifs-MATCHES.txt | awk '{print $6}' > MT-SURFs-AccesProms-AME-CisBPmotifs-MATCHES-DoubleCheckedWithALTID.txt; 


awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' MT-SURFgenes-WithUpInSUBthsInPromoter-2000toplus500.bed > MT-enTHSsInPromOfSURFgenes.bed; 
151 total

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MT-enTHSsInPromOfSURFgenes.bed -fo MT-enTHSsInPromOfSURFgenes-SEQUENCES.txt; 




awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' Nan-THSonly-CisBP-ATH.txt TF_Information.txt > Nan-THSonly-CisBP-ATH-MATCHES.txt; 


awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' Nan-THSonly-CisBP-ATH-ALTID.txt Nan-THSonly-CisBP-ATH-MATCHES.txt | awk '{print $6}' > Nan-THSonly-CisBP-ATH-MATCHES-DoubleCheckedWithALTID.txt;

TESTING FIMO

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt SL-Plus-Genes.bed > SL-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt SL-Minus-Genes.bed > SL-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed; 

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' SL-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed > SL-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' SL-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed > SL-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt; 

cat SL-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt SL-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt > SL-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm SL-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; rm SL-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt;  

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/S_lycopersicum_chromosomes.3.00.fa -bed SL-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed -fo SL-SURFgenes-PromSEQS.txt;

awk '{print $1"\t""3XHMGBOX1"}' 3XHMGBOX1-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 1.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G69570"}' AT1G69570-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 2.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G66940"}' AT5G66940-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 3.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""BPC1"}' BPC1-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 4.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""OBP3"}' OBP3-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 5.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""TF3A"}' TF3A-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 6.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH122"}' bHLH122-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 7.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH80"}' bHLH80-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 8.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G47655"}' AT1G47655-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 9.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G02460"}' AT5G02460-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 10.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""At4g38000"}' At4g38000-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 11.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""FRS9"}' FRS9-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 12.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' REM19-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 13.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 14.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH130"}' bHLH130-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 15.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 16.bed; 


cat 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed > SL-MotifDistances.txt; 
rm 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed; 

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/TESTING/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SL-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/WithEnTHSs; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Plus.txt SP-Genes.bed > SP-Plus-Genes.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Minus.txt SP-Genes.bed > SP-Minus-Genes.bed; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt SP-Plus-Genes.bed > SP-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt SP-Minus-Genes.bed > SP-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed; 

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' SP-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed > SP-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' SP-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed > SP-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt; 

cat SP-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt SP-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt > SP-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm SP-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; rm SP-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt;  

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Spenn.fasta -bed SP-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed -fo SP-SURFgenes-PromSEQS.txt;

###
###

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Plus.txt MT-Genes.bed > MT-Plus-Genes.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Minus.txt MT-Genes.bed > MT-Minus-Genes.bed; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt MT-Plus-Genes.bed > MT-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt MT-Minus-Genes.bed > MT-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed; 

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' MT-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed > MT-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' MT-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed > MT-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt; 

cat MT-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt MT-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt > MT-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm MT-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; rm MT-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt;  

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MT-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed -fo MT-SURFgenes-PromSEQS.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-coords.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT5G66940.txt > AT5G66940-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT5G66940-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT5G66940-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT5G66940-coords.txt > AT5G66940-correct-coords.txt; mv AT5G66940-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT5G66940-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' BPC1.txt > BPC1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' BPC1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' BPC1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' BPC1-coords.txt > BPC1-correct-coords.txt; mv BPC1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/BPC1-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' OBP3.txt > OBP3-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' OBP3-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' OBP3-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' OBP3-coords.txt > OBP3-correct-coords.txt; mv OBP3-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/OBP3-coords.txt;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/Medicago/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/MT-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Plus.txt OS-Genes.bed > OS-Plus-Genes.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Minus.txt OS-Genes.bed > OS-Minus-Genes.bed; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-Plus-Genes.bed > OS-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-Minus-Genes.bed > OS-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed; 

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' OS-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed > OS-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' OS-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed > OS-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt; 

cat OS-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt OS-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt > OS-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm OS-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; rm OS-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt;  

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa -bed OS-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed -fo OS-SURFgenes-PromSEQS.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt;

cd Distances;

awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G69570"}' AT1G69570-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 2.bed;

awk '{print $1"\t""BPC1"}' BPC1-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 4.bed;

awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 16.bed;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/Rice/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/OS-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Plus.txt SP-Genes.bed > SP-Plus-Genes.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($6 in a)' Minus.txt SP-Genes.bed > SP-Minus-Genes.bed; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt SP-Plus-Genes.bed > SP-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt SP-Minus-Genes.bed > SP-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed; 

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' SP-SURFgenes-PLUS.bed > SP-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' SP-SURFgenes-MINUS.bed > SP-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt; 

cat SP-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt SP-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt > SP-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm SP-SURFgenes-PLUS-PromCoords.txt; rm SP-SURFgenes-MINUS-PromCoords.txt;  

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Spenn.fasta -bed SP-SURFgenes-PromCoords.bed -fo SP-SURFgenes-PromSEQS.txt; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/Pennellii;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-coords.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT1G47655.txt > AT1G47655-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G47655-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G47655-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' AT1G47655-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G47655-coords.txt > AT1G47655-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G47655-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G47655-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT5G02460.txt > AT5G02460-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT5G02460-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT5G02460-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' AT5G02460-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT5G02460-coords.txt > AT5G02460-correct-coords.txt; mv AT5G02460-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT5G02460-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' At4g38000.txt > At4g38000-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' At4g38000-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' At4g38000-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' At4g38000-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' At4g38000-coords.txt > At4g38000-correct-coords.txt; mv At4g38000-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/At4g38000-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' FRS9.txt > FRS9-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' FRS9-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' FRS9-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' FRS9-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' FRS9-coords.txt > FRS9-correct-coords.txt; mv FRS9-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/FRS9-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' REM19.txt > REM19-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' REM19-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' REM19-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' REM19-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' REM19-coords.txt > REM19-correct-coords.txt; mv REM19-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/REM19-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' VRN1.txt > VRN1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' VRN1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' VRN1-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' VRN1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' VRN1-coords.txt > VRN1-correct-coords.txt; mv VRN1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/VRN1-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' bHLH130.txt > bHLH130-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' bHLH130-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' bHLH130-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' bHLH130-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' bHLH130-coords.txt > bHLH130-correct-coords.txt; mv bHLH130-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/bHLH130-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AGL20.txt > AGL20-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AGL20-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AGL20-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' AGL20-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AGL20-coords.txt > AGL20-correct-coords.txt; mv AGL20-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AGL20-coords.txt;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/Pennellii/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SP-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' SP-PromMotifs.txt TF_Information.txt > SP-PromMotifs-MATCHES.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SP-PromMotifs-ALTID.txt SP-PromMotifs-MATCHES.txt | awk '{print $6}' > SP-PromMotifs-DoubleCheckedWithALTID.txt;

R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MT-TFscoords/Further/NearbyGenes/Distances/MT-Motif-BEST-Distances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

Motifs Within enTHSs

Overlap FIMO output from SURF promoters (coordinates) and overlap with enriched THSs

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/enrichedTHSs/MT; 

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' MT-UpInSUB-Pval-merged50p.bed > MT-enTHSs.bed; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a 3XHMGBOX1-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > 3XHMGBOX1-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT1G69570-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > AT1G69570-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT5G66940-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > AT5G66940-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a BPC1-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > BPC1-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a OBP3-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > OBP3-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a TF3A-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > TF3A-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH122-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > bHLH122-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH80-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > bHLH80-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT1G47655-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > AT1G47655-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AT5G02460-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > AT5G02460-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a At4g38000-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > At4g38000-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a FRS9-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > FRS9-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a REM19-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > REM19-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a VRN1-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > VRN1-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH130-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > bHLH130-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a AGL20-coords.bed -b MT-enTHSs.bed > AGL20-MT-enTHS-intersect.bed;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/enrichedTHSs/MT/NearbyGenes/Distances/MT-enTHS-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

bedtools intersect -wa -a TF3A-coords.bed -b OS-enTHSs.bed > TF3A-OS-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH122-coords.bed -b OS-enTHSs.bed > bHLH122-OS-enTHS-intersect.bed;  
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH80-coords.bed -b OS-enTHSs.bed > bHLH80-OS-enTHS-intersect.bed;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/enrichedTHSs/OS/NearbyGenes/Distances/OS-enTHS-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

###
Motifs in ALL genes

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/ALLgenes; 

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' MT-Plus-Genes.bed > MT-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' MT-Minus-Genes.bed > MT-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 

cat MT-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt MT-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt > MT-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm MT-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; rm MT-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MT-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed -fo MT-AllGenes-PromSEQS.txt; 

####Manuallyremoveany-inyourbedfilebeforedoingthegetfastapart

awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' OS-Plus-Genes.bed > OS-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' OS-Minus-Genes.bed > OS-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 

cat OS-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt OS-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt > OS-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm OS-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; rm OS-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa -bed OS-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed -fo OS-AllGenes-PromSEQS.txt; 


awk '{print $1"\t"($2-=2000)"\t"($2+=2500)}' SL-Plus-Genes.bed > SL-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' SL-Minus-Genes.bed > SL-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 

cat SL-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt SL-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt > SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm SL-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; rm SL-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 

bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/S_lycopersicum_chromosomes.3.00.fa -bed SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed -fo SL-AllGenes-PromSEQS.txt;

awk '{print $1"\t"($3-=500)"\t"($3+=2500)}' SP-Minus-Genes.bed > SP-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; 

cat SP-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt SP-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt > SP-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed; 
rm SP-Plus-Genes-PromCoords.txt; rm SP-Minus-Genes-PromCoords.txt;

mkdir Coordinates; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-coords.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif



#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/ALLgenes/AllGeneFIMO/MT/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/MT-AllGenes-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/ALLgenes/AllGeneFIMO/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/OS-AllGenes-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

mkdir Coordinates; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-coords.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/ALLgenes/AllGeneFIMO/SL/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SL-AllGenes-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ;  ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt ; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt;

Add manual header, Distance and Motif

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/ALLgenes/AllGeneFIMO/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SP-AllGenes-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")







cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$8}' VRN1.txt | awk '{ if (!($1 in a)) a[$1] = $4; else if (a[$1] > $4) a[$1] = $4 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' | awk '{print$1"SSSSSSS"$2}' > VRN1-querylines.txt; 
awk '{print $3"SSSSSSS"$8"\t"$4"\t"$5}' VRN1.txt > VRN1-checkHERE.txt; awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' VRN1-querylines.txt VRN1-checkHERE.txt > VRN1-queried.txt; 
ex -sc '%s/SSSSSSS/	/g|x' VRN1-queried.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$3"\t"$4}' VRN1-queried.txt > VRN1-queried-processed.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' VRN1-queried-processed.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' VRN1-queried-processed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' VRN1-queried-processed.txt > Coordinates/VRN1-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.txt;
rm VRN1-checkHERE.txt; rm VRN1-querylines.txt; rm VRN1-queried-processed.txt; rm VRN1-queried.txt; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults/Coordinates; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p VRN1-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.txt  -a MT-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' VRN1-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > VRN1-MT-BEST-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' VRN1-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.tss.txt > VRN1-MT-BEST-DISTANCES.bed; 
mv *GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances; 
cd Distances;

awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-queried-processed.txt > Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$8}' AT5G02460.txt | awk '{ if (!($1 in a)) a[$1] = $4; else if (a[$1] > $4) a[$1] = $4 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' | awk '{print$1"SSSSSSS"$2}' > AT5G02460-querylines.txt; 
awk '{print $3"SSSSSSS"$8"\t"$4"\t"$5}' AT5G02460.txt > AT5G02460-checkHERE.txt; awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' AT5G02460-querylines.txt AT5G02460-checkHERE.txt > AT5G02460-queried.txt; 
ex -sc '%s/SSSSSSS/	/g|x' AT5G02460-queried.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$3"\t"$4}' AT5G02460-queried.txt > AT5G02460-queried-processed.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT5G02460-queried-processed.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT5G02460-queried-processed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT5G02460-queried-processed.txt > Coordinates/AT5G02460-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.txt;
rm AT5G02460-checkHERE.txt; rm AT5G02460-querylines.txt; rm AT5G02460-queried-processed.txt; rm AT5G02460-queried.txt; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults/Coordinates; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p AT5G02460-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.txt  -a MT-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' AT5G02460-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > AT5G02460-MT-BEST-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' AT5G02460-BESTMatchedPvalue-coords.tss.txt > AT5G02460-MT-BEST-DISTANCES.bed; 
mv *GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances; 
cd Distances; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults;

awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-MT-BEST-DISTANCES.bed  > 16.bed; 

cat 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed > MT-BEST-MotifDistances.txt; 
rm 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed; 

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/MT-BEST-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")







awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1-BEST"}' VRN1-MT-BEST-DISTANCES.bed  > 1.bed; awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1-MT-DISTANCES.bed  > 2.bed; 
cat 1.bed 2.bed > MT-VRN1-MotifDistances.txt; rm 1.bed 2.bed;

Manually added Value and Motif


R
Numbers <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults/MT-FIMO-Pvalues.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numbers$Motif <- as.factor(Numbers$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numbers, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Motif)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO P values") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(P value)")





awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""3XHMGBOX1"}' > 3XHMGBOX1-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' AT1G69570.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""AT1G69570"}' > AT1G69570-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' AT5G66940.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""AT5G66940"}' > AT5G66940-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' BPC1.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""BPC1"}' > BPC1-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' OBP3.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""OBP3"}' > OBP3-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' TF3A.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""TF3A"}' > TF3A-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' bHLH122.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""bHLH122"}' > bHLH122-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' bHLH80.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""bHLH80"}' > bHLH80-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' AT1G47655.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""AT1G47655"}' > AT1G47655-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' AT5G02460.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""AT5G02460"}' > AT5G02460-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' At4g38000.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""At4g38000"}' > At4g38000-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' FRS9.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""FRS9"}' > FRS9-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' REM19.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""REM19"}' > REM19-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' VRN1.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""VRN1"}' > VRN1-bestPvalue.txt; 
awk '{ if (!($3 in a)) a[$3] = $8; else if (a[$3] > $8) a[$3] = $8 } END {for (key in a) print key, a[key]}' bHLH130.txt | awk '{print $2"\t""bHLH130"}' > bHLH130-bestPvalue.txt;

cat 3XHMGBOX1-bestPvalue.txt AT1G69570-bestPvalue.txt AT5G66940-bestPvalue.txt BPC1-bestPvalue.txt OBP3-bestPvalue.txt TF3A-bestPvalue.txt bHLH122-bestPvalue.txt bHLH80-bestPvalue.txt AT1G47655-bestPvalue.txt AT5G02460-bestPvalue.txt At4g38000-bestPvalue.txt FRS9-bestPvalue.txt REM19-bestPvalue.txt VRN1-bestPvalue.txt bHLH130-bestPvalue.txt AGL20-bestPvalue.txt > MT-SurfPromoters-FIMObestPvalues.txt;

R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WorkingWIthPvalues/Medicago/FIMOresults/MT-SurfPromoters-FIMObestPvalues.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F)

Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Motif)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO P values") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(P value)")

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT1G69570-int1.txt > AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-int2.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT5G66940.txt > AT5G66940-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT5G66940-int1.txt > AT5G66940-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT5G66940-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT5G66940-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT5G66940-int2.txt > AT5G66940-correct-coords.txt; mv AT5G66940-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT5G66940-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' BPC1.txt > BPC1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' BPC1-int1.txt > BPC1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' BPC1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' BPC1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' BPC1-int2.txt > BPC1-correct-coords.txt; mv BPC1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/BPC1-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' OBP3.txt > OBP3-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' OBP3-int1.txt > OBP3-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' OBP3-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' OBP3-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' OBP3-int2.txt > OBP3-correct-coords.txt; mv OBP3-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/OBP3-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' TF3A.txt > TF3A-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' TF3A-int1.txt > TF3A-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' TF3A-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' TF3A-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' TF3A-int2.txt > TF3A-correct-coords.txt; mv TF3A-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/TF3A-coords.txt; rm *int*;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/Medicago/FIMOresults/qvalues; cat *qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Value	Motif"}1' 1111.txt > MT-FIMOinSURFpromoters-qvalues.txt; cat *qvaaalues.txt > 2222.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Value	Motif"}1' 2222.txt > MT-FIMOinSURFpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""All qValues"}' MT-FIMOinSURFpromoters-qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'NR >1 {print $1"\t"$2"\t""Filtered qValues"}' MT-FIMOinSURFpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt > 2222.txt; cat 1111.txt 2222.txt > 3333.txt; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Value	Motif	Type" 3333.txt > MT-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt 3333.txt; 


#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/Medicago/FIMOresults/qvalues/MT-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/Medicago/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/MT-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT1G69570-int1.txt > AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-int2.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt; rm *int*;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT5G02460.txt > AT5G02460-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT5G02460-int1.txt > AT5G02460-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT5G02460-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT5G02460-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT5G02460-int2.txt > AT5G02460-correct-coords.txt; mv AT5G02460-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT5G02460-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' At4g38000.txt > At4g38000-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' At4g38000-int1.txt > At4g38000-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' At4g38000-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' At4g38000-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' At4g38000-int2.txt > At4g38000-correct-coords.txt; mv At4g38000-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/At4g38000-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' FRS9.txt > FRS9-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' FRS9-int1.txt > FRS9-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' FRS9-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' FRS9-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' FRS9-int2.txt > FRS9-correct-coords.txt; mv FRS9-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/FRS9-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' REM19.txt > REM19-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' REM19-int1.txt > REM19-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' REM19-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' REM19-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' REM19-int2.txt > REM19-correct-coords.txt; mv REM19-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/REM19-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' VRN1.txt > VRN1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' VRN1-int1.txt > VRN1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' VRN1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' VRN1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' VRN1-int2.txt > VRN1-correct-coords.txt; mv VRN1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/VRN1-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' bHLH130.txt > bHLH130-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' bHLH130-int1.txt > bHLH130-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' bHLH130-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' bHLH130-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' bHLH130-int2.txt > bHLH130-correct-coords.txt; mv bHLH130-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/bHLH130-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AGL20.txt > AGL20-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AGL20-int1.txt > AGL20-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AGL20-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AGL20-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AGL20-int2.txt > AGL20-correct-coords.txt; mv AGL20-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AGL20-coords.txt; rm *int*;

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""All qValues"}' OS-FIMOinSURFpromoters-qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'NR >1 {print $1"\t"$2"\t""Filtered qValues"}' OS-FIMOinSURFpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt > 2222.txt; cat 1111.txt 2222.txt > 3333.txt; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Value	Motif	Type" 3333.txt > OS-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt 3333.txt; 


#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/Rice/FIMOresults/qvalues/OS-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G66940"}' AT5G66940-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 3.bed;

rm 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed 17.bed; 



#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/Rice/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/OS-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; rm *int*;

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""All qValues"}' SL-FIMOinSURFpromoters-qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'NR >1 {print $1"\t"$2"\t""Filtered qValues"}' SL-FIMOinSURFpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt > 2222.txt; cat 1111.txt 2222.txt > 3333.txt; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Value	Motif	Type" 3333.txt > SL-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt 3333.txt; 


#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SL/FIMOresults/qvalues/SL-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' OBP3-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > OBP3-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' OBP3-coords.tss.txt > OBP3-SL-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' TF3A-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > TF3A-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' TF3A-coords.tss.txt > TF3A-SL-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH122-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH122-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH122-coords.tss.txt > bHLH122-SL-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH80-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH80-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH80-coords.tss.txt > bHLH80-SL-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' AT1G47655-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > AT1G47655-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' AT1G47655-coords.tss.txt > AT1G47655-SL-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' AT5G02460-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > AT5G02460-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' AT5G02460-coords.tss.txt > AT5G02460-SL-DISTANCES.bed;

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' VRN1-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > VRN1-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' VRN1-coords.tss.txt > VRN1-SL-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH130-coords.tss.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH130-SL-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH130-coords.tss.txt > bHLH130-SL-DISTANCES.bed;

mkdir Genes; mkdir Distances; 
mv *GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances; 

cd Distances; 

awk '{print $1"\t""3XHMGBOX1"}' 3XHMGBOX1-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 1.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G69570"}' AT1G69570-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 2.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G66940"}' AT5G66940-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 3.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""BPC1"}' BPC1-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 4.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""OBP3"}' OBP3-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 5.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""TF3A"}' TF3A-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 6.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH122"}' bHLH122-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 7.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH80"}' bHLH80-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 8.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G47655"}' AT1G47655-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 9.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G02460"}' AT5G02460-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 10.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""At4g38000"}' At4g38000-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 11.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""FRS9"}' FRS9-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 12.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' REM19-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 13.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 14.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH130"}' bHLH130-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 15.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-SL-DISTANCES.bed  > 16.bed; 


cat 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed > 17.bed; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Distance	Motif" 17.bed > SL-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt;
rm 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed 17.bed; 



#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SL/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SL-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; rm *int*;

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""All qValues"}' SP-FIMOinSURFpromoters-qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'NR >1 {print $1"\t"$2"\t""Filtered qValues"}' SP-FIMOinSURFpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt > 2222.txt; cat 1111.txt 2222.txt > 3333.txt; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Value	Motif	Type" 3333.txt > SP-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt 3333.txt; 


#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults/qvalues/SP-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SP-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($2 in a)' CommonMotifs.txt MT-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""MT"}' | awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Distance	Motif	Species" > MT-SharedMotifs-Distances.txt; ex -sc '%s/At4g38000/AT4G38000/g|x' MT-SharedMotifs-Distances.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($2 in a)' CommonMotifs.txt OS-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""OS"}' | awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Distance	Motif	Species" > OS-SharedMotifs-Distances.txt; ex -sc '%s/At4g38000/AT4G38000/g|x' OS-SharedMotifs-Distances.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($2 in a)' CommonMotifs.txt SL-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""SL"}' | awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Distance	Motif	Species" > SL-SharedMotifs-Distances.txt; ex -sc '%s/At4g38000/AT4G38000/g|x' SL-SharedMotifs-Distances.txt;

#R
library("ggplot2")
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes/AllSpecies-HRPEqvaluesSURFpromoters.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$MotifSpecies <- as.factor(Numberss$"Motif-Species")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(MotifSpecies, -log(Value), colour=MotifSpecies)) + geom_point() + xlab("HRPE motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("HRPE qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' bHLH130.txt > bHLH130-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' bHLH130-int1.txt > bHLH130-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' bHLH130-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' bHLH130-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' bHLH130-int2.txt > bHLH130-correct-coords.txt; mv bHLH130-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/bHLH130-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AGL20.txt > AGL20-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AGL20-int1.txt > AGL20-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AGL20-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AGL20-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AGL20-int2.txt > AGL20-correct-coords.txt; mv AGL20-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AGL20-coords.txt; rm *int*; 


####Plotting

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""All qValues"}' MT-FIMOinALLpromoters-qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'NR >1 {print $1"\t"$2"\t""Filtered qValues"}' MT-FIMOinALLpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt > 2222.txt; cat 1111.txt 2222.txt > 3333.txt; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Value	Motif	Type" 3333.txt > MT-FIMO-ALL-qvalues-both.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt 3333.txt; 


#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/ALLgenes/MT/qvalues/MT-FIMO-ALL-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/ALLgenes/MT/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/MT-AllGenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT1G69570-int1.txt > AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-int2.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT5G66940.txt > AT5G66940-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT5G66940-int1.txt > AT5G66940-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT5G66940-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT5G66940-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT5G66940-int2.txt > AT5G66940-correct-coords.txt; mv AT5G66940-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT5G66940-coords.txt; rm *int*;

#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/ALLgenes/OS/qvalues/OS-FIMO-ALL-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

mkdir Genes; mkdir Distances; 
mv *GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances; 

cd Distances; 

awk '{print $1"\t""3XHMGBOX1"}' 3XHMGBOX1-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 1.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G69570"}' AT1G69570-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 2.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G66940"}' AT5G66940-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 3.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""BPC1"}' BPC1-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 4.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""OBP3"}' OBP3-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 5.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""TF3A"}' TF3A-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 6.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH122"}' bHLH122-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 7.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH80"}' bHLH80-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 8.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G47655"}' AT1G47655-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 9.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G02460"}' AT5G02460-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 10.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""At4g38000"}' At4g38000-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 11.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""FRS9"}' FRS9-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 12.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' REM19-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 13.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 14.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH130"}' bHLH130-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 15.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-OS-DISTANCES.bed  > 16.bed; 


cat 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed > 17.bed; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Distance	Motif" 17.bed > OS-AllGenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt;
rm 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed 17.bed; 



#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/ALLgenes/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/OS-AllGenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT1G69570-int1.txt > AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-int2.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt; rm *int*;

#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/ALLgenes/SL/qvalues/SL-FIMO-ALL-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

rm 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed 17.bed; 



#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/ALLgenes/SL/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SL-AllGenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")
