awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' 3XHMGBOX1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-int1.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' 3XHMGBOX1-int2.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt; mv 3XHMGBOX1-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/3XHMGBOX1-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' AT1G69570.txt > AT1G69570-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' AT1G69570-int1.txt > AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/Spenn	/Spenn-/g|x' AT1G69570-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' AT1G69570-int2.txt > AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt; mv AT1G69570-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/AT1G69570-coords.txt; rm *int*;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults; awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""FRS9"}' FRS9.txt > qvalues/FRS9-qvalues.txt; cd qvalues; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' FRS9-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""FRS9"}' > FRS9-Filtered-qvaaalues.txt; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults; awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""REM19"}' REM19.txt > qvalues/REM19-qvalues.txt; cd qvalues; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' REM19-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' > REM19-Filtered-qvaaalues.txt; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults; awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1.txt > qvalues/VRN1-qvalues.txt; cd qvalues; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' VRN1-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' > VRN1-Filtered-qvaaalues.txt; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults; awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""bHLH130"}' bHLH130.txt > qvalues/bHLH130-qvalues.txt; cd qvalues; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' bHLH130-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH130"}' > bHLH130-Filtered-qvaaalues.txt; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults; awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20.txt > qvalues/AGL20-qvalues.txt; cd qvalues; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' AGL20-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' > AGL20-Filtered-qvaaalues.txt; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults/qvalues; cat *qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Value	Motif"}1' 1111.txt > SP-FIMOinSURFpromoters-qvalues.txt; cat *qvaaalues.txt > 2222.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Value	Motif"}1' 2222.txt > SP-FIMOinSURFpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t""All qValues"}' SP-FIMOinSURFpromoters-qvalues.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'NR >1 {print $1"\t"$2"\t""Filtered qValues"}' SP-FIMOinSURFpromoters-Filtered-qvalues.txt > 2222.txt; cat 1111.txt 2222.txt > 3333.txt; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Value	Motif	Type" 3333.txt > SP-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt; rm 1111.txt 2222.txt 3333.txt; 


#R
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/SP/FIMOresults/qvalues/SP-FIMO-qvalues-both.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$Motif <- as.factor(Numberss$Motif)
Numberss$Value <- as.numeric(as.character(Numberss$Value))
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(Motif, -log(Value), colour=Type)) + geom_point() + xlab("Motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("FIMO qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/qValueWork/ALLgenes/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances/SP-AllGenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk '{print $1"\t""TF3A"}' TF3A-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 6.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH122"}' bHLH122-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 7.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH80"}' bHLH80-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 8.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT1G47655"}' AT1G47655-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 9.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AT5G02460"}' AT5G02460-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 10.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""At4g38000"}' At4g38000-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 11.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""FRS9"}' FRS9-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 12.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' REM19-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 13.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 14.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH130"}' bHLH130-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 15.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-SP-DISTANCES.bed  > 16.bed; 


cat 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed > 17.bed; awk '$0 = NR==1 ? replace : $0' replace="Distance	Motif" 17.bed > SP-SURFgenes-qValueFiltered-MotifDistances.txt;
rm 1.bed 2.bed 3.bed 4.bed 5.bed 6.bed 7.bed 8.bed 9.bed 10.bed 11.bed 12.bed 13.bed 14.bed 15.bed 16.bed 17.bed;

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/t-MEMEresults/Coordinates/MT-NearestGenes/Distances/MT-MEME-distances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")
#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/t-MEMEresults/Coordinates/OS-NearestGenes/Distances/OS-MEME-distances.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-3000,1000) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

wc -l SP-DownTHS-AGL20.txt SP-DownTHS-DOF2p4.txt SP-DownTHS-DOF4p7.txt SP-DownTHS-DOF5p8.txt SP-DownTHS-OBP3.txt SP-DownTHS-REM19.txt SP-DownTHS-VRN1.txt > SP-FIMOnumbers.txt; 



awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-DownTHS-AGL20.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Down-AGL20-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Down-AGL20-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' int2.txt > MT-Down-AGL20-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-DownTHS-DOF2p4.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Down-DOF2p4-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Down-DOF2p4-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF2p4"}' int2.txt > MT-Down-DOF2p4-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-DownTHS-DOF4p7.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Down-DOF4p7-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Down-DOF4p7-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF4p7"}' int2.txt > MT-Down-DOF4p7-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-DownTHS-DOF5p8.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Down-DOF5p8-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Down-DOF5p8-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF5p8"}' int2.txt > MT-Down-DOF5p8-sum.txt; rm int*.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-DownTHS-REM19.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Down-REM19-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Down-REM19-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' int2.txt > MT-Down-REM19-sum.txt; rm int*.txt;

cat *sum.txt > MT-sums.txt; rm *sum.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SL-DownTHS-OBP3.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > SL-Down-OBP3-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SL-Down-OBP3-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""OBP3"}' int2.txt > SL-Down-OBP3-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SL-DownTHS-REM19.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > SL-Down-REM19-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SL-Down-REM19-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' int2.txt > SL-Down-REM19-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SL-DownTHS-VRN1.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > SL-Down-VRN1-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SL-Down-VRN1-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' int2.txt > SL-Down-VRN1-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 

cat *sum.txt > SL-sums.txt; rm *sum.txt; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SP-DownTHS-AGL20.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"-"$2"\t"($3+$5)"\t"($3+$6)}' int1.txt > SP-Down-AGL20-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-Down-AGL20-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' int2.txt > SP-Down-AGL20-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SP-DownTHS-DOF2p4.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"-"$2"\t"($3+$5)"\t"($3+$6)}' int1.txt > SP-Down-DOF2p4-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-Down-DOF2p4-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF2p4"}' int2.txt > SP-Down-DOF2p4-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SP-DownTHS-DOF4p7.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"-"$2"\t"($3+$5)"\t"($3+$6)}' int1.txt > SP-Down-DOF4p7-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-Down-DOF4p7-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF4p7"}' int2.txt > SP-Down-DOF4p7-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SP-DownTHS-DOF5p8.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"-"$2"\t"($3+$5)"\t"($3+$6)}' int1.txt > SP-Down-DOF5p8-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-Down-DOF5p8-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF5p8"}' int2.txt > SP-Down-DOF5p8-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SP-DownTHS-OBP3.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"-"$2"\t"($3+$5)"\t"($3+$6)}' int1.txt > SP-Down-OBP3-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-Down-OBP3-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""OBP3"}' int2.txt > SP-Down-OBP3-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SP-DownTHS-REM19.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"-"$2"\t"($3+$5)"\t"($3+$6)}' int1.txt > SP-Down-REM19-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-Down-REM19-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' int2.txt > SP-Down-REM19-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' SP-DownTHS-VRN1.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"-"$2"\t"($3+$5)"\t"($3+$6)}' int1.txt > SP-Down-VRN1-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-Down-VRN1-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' int2.txt > SP-Down-VRN1-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 

cat *sum.txt > SP-sums.txt; rm *sum.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-UpTHS-DOF5p8.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Up-DOF5p8-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Up-DOF5p8-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF5p8"}' int2.txt > MT-Up-DOF5p8-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-UpTHS-OBP3.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Up-OBP3-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Up-OBP3-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""OBP3"}' int2.txt > MT-Up-OBP3-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-UpTHS-REM19.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Up-REM19-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Up-REM19-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' int2.txt > MT-Up-REM19-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-UpTHS-VRN1.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-Up-VRN1-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-Up-VRN1-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' int2.txt > MT-Up-VRN1-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 

cat *sum.txt > MT-sums.txt; rm *sum.txt;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs;  
bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa -bed MT-AllTHSs.bed -fo MT-AllTHSs.txt; 
bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa -bed OS-AllTHSs.bed -fo OS-AllTHSs.txt; 
bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/S_lycopersicum_chromosomes.3.00.fa -bed SL-ROOT-AllTHSs.bed -fo SL-AllTHSs.txt; 
bedtools getfasta -fi /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Spenn.fasta -bed SP-ROOT-AllTHSs.bed -fo SP-AllTHSs.txt; 

fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o AGL20 AGL20.txt MT-AllTHSs.txt; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o DOF2p4 DOF2p4.txt MT-AllTHSs.txt; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o DOF4p7 DOF4p7.txt MT-AllTHSs.txt; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o DOF5p8 DOF5p8.txt MT-AllTHSs.txt; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o OBP3 OBP3.txt MT-AllTHSs.txt; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o REM19 REM19.txt MT-AllTHSs.txt; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o VRN1 VRN1.txt MT-AllTHSs.txt; 

cd AGL20; mv fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs/MT-AllTHS-AGL20.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs; rm -R AGL20; 
cd DOF2p4; mv fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs/MT-AllTHS-DOF2p4.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs; rm -R DOF2p4; 
cd DOF4p7; mv fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs/MT-AllTHS-DOF4p7.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs; rm -R DOF4p7; 
cd DOF5p8; mv fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs/MT-AllTHS-DOF5p8.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs; rm -R DOF5p8; 
cd OBP3; mv fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs/MT-AllTHS-OBP3.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs; rm -R OBP3; 
cd REM19; mv fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs/MT-AllTHS-REM19.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs; rm -R REM19; 
cd VRN1; mv fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs/MT-AllTHS-VRN1.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/THSsUpAndDown/AllSeqs; rm -R VRN1; 

wc -l MT-AllTHS-AGL20.txt MT-AllTHS-DOF2p4.txt MT-AllTHS-DOF4p7.txt MT-AllTHS-DOF5p8.txt MT-AllTHS-OBP3.txt MT-AllTHS-REM19.txt MT-AllTHS-VRN1.txt > MT-FIMOnumbers.txt;

fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o AGL20 AGL20.txt OS-AllTHSs.txt;

fimo --max-stored-scores 1000000000 --o AGL20 AGL20.txt SP-AllTHSs.txt;

awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-AllTHS-AGL20.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-All-AGL20-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-All-AGL20-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' int2.txt > MT-All-AGL20-sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' MT-AllTHS-DOF2p4.txt > int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' int1.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' int1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' int1.txt > MT-All-DOF2p4-coords.txt; rm int1.txt; awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-All-DOF2p4-coords.txt > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""DOF2p4"}' int2.txt > MT-All-DOF2p4-sum.txt; rm int*.txt;

awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MT-UpInSUB-Pval-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""MT-Up"}' int2.txt > MT-UpTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' MTRallTHSs-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""MT-All"}' int2.txt > MT-AllTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' OS-AllTHSs-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""OS-All"}' int2.txt > OS-AllTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' OS-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""OS-Down"}' int2.txt > OS-DownTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' OS-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""OS-Up"}' int2.txt > OS-UpTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SL-ROOT-All-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""SL-All"}' int2.txt > SL-AllTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SL-ROOT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""SL-Down"}' int2.txt > SL-DownTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SL-ROOT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""SL-Up"}' int2.txt > SL-UpTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-ROOT-All-dashed-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""SP-All"}' int2.txt > SP-AllTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-dashed-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""SP-Down"}' int2.txt > SP-DownTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 
awk '{print ($3-$2)}' SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-dashed-merged50p.bed > int1.txt; awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum;}' int1.txt > int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t""SP-Up"}' int2.txt > SP-UpTHSs-Sum.txt; rm int*.txt; 

cat *-Sum.txt > SpeciesSummaryInfo.txt; rm *-Sum.txt; 
























Little post fact, but had to do some correcting

bedtools sort -i SL-ROOT-All.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-ROOT-All-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-SHOOT-All-dashed.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SP-SHOOT-All-dashed-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-SHOOT-All.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-SHOOT-All-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-HAIRY-All.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-HAIRY-All-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-ROOT-All-dashed.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SP-ROOT-All-dashed-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i MTRallTHSs.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > MTRallTHSs-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i MT-DownInSUB-Pval.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > MT-DownInSUB-Pval-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i MT-UpInSUB-Pval.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > MT-UpInSUB-Pval-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i OS-AllTHSs.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > OS-AllTHSs-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i OS-DownInSUB-pval.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > OS-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i OS-UpInSUB-pval.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > OS-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed; 

bedtools sort -i SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB-dashed.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SP-SHOOT-DownInSUB-dashed-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB-dashed.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SP-SHOOT-UpInSUB-dashed-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-dashed.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SP-ROOT-DownInSUB-dashed-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-dashed.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SP-ROOT-UpInSUB-dashed-merged50p.bed; 

bedtools sort -i SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-SHOOT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-SHOOT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-ROOT-DownInSUB.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-ROOT-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-ROOT-UpInSUB.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-ROOT-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-HAIRY-DownInSUB-merged50p.bed; 
bedtools sort -i SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB.bed | bedtools merge -d -150 > SL-HAIRY-UpInSUB-merged50p.bed; 

mv *merged50p.bed CORRECT;

cd OS-HRPE; cp fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes/OS-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes;
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' OS-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > OS-HRPE-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' OS-HRPE-int1.txt > OS-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' OS-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' OS-HRPE-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' OS-HRPE-int2.txt > OS-HRPE-correct-coords.txt; mv OS-HRPE-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/OS-HRPE-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""HRPE"}' OS-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > OS-HRPE-qvalues.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' OS-HRPE-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""HRPE"}' > OS-HRPE-qvalues-filtered.txt; 
cd MT-HRPE; cp fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes/MT-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes;
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' MT-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > MT-HRPE-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' MT-HRPE-int1.txt > MT-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' MT-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' MT-HRPE-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' MT-HRPE-int2.txt > MT-HRPE-correct-coords.txt; mv MT-HRPE-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/MT-HRPE-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""HRPE"}' MT-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > MT-HRPE-qvalues.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' MT-HRPE-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""HRPE"}' > MT-HRPE-qvalues-filtered.txt; 
cd SL-HRPE; cp fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes/SL-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes;
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' SL-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > SL-HRPE-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' SL-HRPE-int1.txt > SL-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' SL-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' SL-HRPE-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' SL-HRPE-int2.txt > SL-HRPE-correct-coords.txt; mv SL-HRPE-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/SL-HRPE-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""HRPE"}' SL-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > SL-HRPE-qvalues.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' SL-HRPE-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""HRPE"}' > SL-HRPE-qvalues-filtered.txt; 
cd SP-HRPE; cp fimo.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes/SP-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt; cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes;
awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5"\t"$9}' SP-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > SP-HRPE-int1.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 0.01) { print } }' SP-HRPE-int1.txt > SP-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/-/	/g|x' SP-HRPE-int2.txt; ex -sc '%s/:/	/g|x' SP-HRPE-int2.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"($2+$4)"\t"($2+$5)}' SP-HRPE-int2.txt > SP-HRPE-correct-coords.txt; mv SP-HRPE-correct-coords.txt Coordinates/SP-HRPE-coords.txt; rm *int*; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $9"\t""HRPE"}' SP-HRPE-SURFgenes.txt > SP-HRPE-qvalues.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($1 <= 0.01) { print } }' SP-HRPE-qvalues.txt | awk '{print $1"\t""HRPE"}' > SP-HRPE-qvalues-filtered.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes; 

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"-OS"}' OS-HRPE-qvalues.txt > OShrpeSURF.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"-MT"}' MT-HRPE-qvalues.txt > MLhrpeSURF.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"-SL"}' SL-HRPE-qvalues.txt > SLhrpeSURF.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"-SP"}' SP-HRPE-qvalues.txt > SPhrpeSURF.txt; 
cat *hrpeSURF.txt > 1111.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Value	MotifSpecies"}1' 1111.txt > AllSpecies-HRPEqvaluesSURFpromoters.txt; rm 1111.txt; 

#R
library("ggplot2")
Numberss <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/HRPE/SURFgenes/AllSpecies-HRPEqvaluesSURFpromoters.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names = F) 
Numberss$MotifSpecies <- as.factor(Numberss$"Motif-Species")
ggplot(Numberss, aes(MotifSpecies, -log(Value), colour=MotifSpecies)) + geom_point() + xlab("HRPE motif") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("HRPE qValues") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("-log10(qValue)") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/HRPE/CheckingInPromoters/NearbyGenes/HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Both-DISTANCES.bed", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names =F)
Values$Type <- as.factor(Values$Type)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Type, colour=Type)) + xlim(-20000,-100) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2) + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("Motif Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt > HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-DISTANCES.bed;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/MT/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' HRPE-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt > HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-DISTANCES.bed; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 10000000000000 --o SL/HRPE HRPE.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/S_lycopersicum_chromosomes.3.00.fa; 
cd SL/HRPE; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/HRPE-SL-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a HRPE-SL-WG.bed -b SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a HRPE-SL-WG-Proms.bed -b SL-HAIRYandROOT-All-merged50p-CATcombined.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs.bed; rm int.bed; 

java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs.bed -a SL-Genes.bed -o AccessiblePromoterNearbyGenes; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/AccessiblePromoterNearbyGenes; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs-ALL-CorrectPromSized-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-THSs-ALL-CorrectPromSized-DISTANCES.bed; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p HRPE-SL-WG-Proms.bed -a SL-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' HRPE-SL-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-DISTANCES.bed; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 10000000000000 --o SP/HRPE HRPE.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/S_lycopersicum_chromosomes.3.00.fa; 
cd SP/HRPE; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/HRPE-SP-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a HRPE-SP-WG.bed -b SP-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a HRPE-SP-WG-Proms.bed -b SP-HAIRY-All-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs.bed; rm int.bed; 

java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs.bed -a SP-Genes.bed -o AccessiblePromoterNearbyGenes; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/AccessiblePromoterNearbyGenes; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs-ALL-CorrectPromSized-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-THSs-ALL-CorrectPromSized-DISTANCES.bed; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p HRPE-SP-WG-Proms.bed -a SP-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' HRPE-SP-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-CorrectedForDistanceToProm.txt > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-CorrectPromSized-DISTANCES.bed; 





java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p MT-HRPEallProms-Original-Allresults.bed -a MT-Genes.bed -o ReAnnHRPEold; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' MT-HRPEallProms-Original-Allresults.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > MT-HRPEallProms-Original-Allresults-corrected.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' MT-HRPEallProms-Original-Allresults-corrected.bed | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-MT-AllOrigCorrected-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' MT-HRPEallProms-Original-Allresults-corrected.bed > HRPE-MT-AllOrigCorrected-DISTANCES.bed;

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' MYB-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' OBP3-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > OBP3-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' REM19-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > REM19-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' TF3A-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > TF3A-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' VRN1-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > VRN1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' 3XHMGBOX1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > 3XHMGBOX1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' 3XHMGBOX1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' CDF5-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > CDF5-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' CDF5-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > CDF5-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' AGL20-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > AGL20-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' AGL20-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > AGL20-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH122-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH122-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH122-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH122-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH130-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH130-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH130-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH130-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH80-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH80-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH80-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH80-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' BPC1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > BPC1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' BPC1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > BPC1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' DOF1p6-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > DOF1p6-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' DOF1p6-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > DOF1p6-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' DOF4p7-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > DOF4p7-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' DOF4p7-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > DOF4p7-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' DOF5p1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > DOF5p1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' DOF5p1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > DOF5p1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' DOF5p8-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > DOF5p8-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' DOF5p8-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > DOF5p8-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' FRS9-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > FRS9-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' FRS9-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > FRS9-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed;

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' VRN1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > VRN1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' VRN1-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > VRN1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 

mv *-GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances;

awk '{print "OS""\t""HRPE""\t"$1}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number13.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""MYB""\t"$1}' MYB-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number18.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""OBP3""\t"$1}' OBP3-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number14.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""REM19""\t"$1}' REM19-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number15.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""TF3A""\t"$1}' TF3A-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number16.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""VRN1""\t"$1}' VRN1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number17.bed; 

wc -l *-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-AllGenesNumbers.txt; 

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Motif""\t""Gene"};{print}' number100.bed > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt; 
rm number*; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($3 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt; 

less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "3XHMGBOX1" > number1.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "AGL20" > number2.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "BPC1" > number3.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "CDF5" > number4.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF1p6" > number5.bed;

less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH130" > number17.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH80" > number18.bed; 


cat number* > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances;

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' number100.bed > OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.txt; rm number*;

cat *SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed > OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.txt; 
wc -l *-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed > OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 
cp OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > OS-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "OS""\t"$1}' OS-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > OS-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv OS-GenomicNumbers.txt OS-UpTHSsNumbers.txt OS-DownTHSsNumbers.txt OS-PromNumbers.txt OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt OS-AllGenesNumbers.txt OS-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' CDF5-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > CDF5-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' AGL20-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > AGL20-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' bHLH122-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > bHLH122-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt;

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' DOF1p6-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > DOF1p6-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt;

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' TF3A-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > TF3A-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' VRN1-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > VRN1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' CDF5-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > CDF5-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' CDF5-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > CDF5-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' AGL20-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > AGL20-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' AGL20-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > AGL20-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed;

mv *-GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/MT/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Genes; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""3XHMGBOX1""\t"$1}' 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number1.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""CDF5""\t"$1}' CDF5-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number2.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""AGL20""\t"$1}' AGL20-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number3.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""bHLH122""\t"$1}' bHLH122-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number4.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""bHLH130""\t"$1}' bHLH130-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number5.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""bHLH80""\t"$1}' bHLH80-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number6.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""BPC1""\t"$1}' BPC1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number7.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""DOF1p6""\t"$1}' DOF1p6-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number8.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""DOF4p7""\t"$1}' DOF4p7-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number9.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""DOF5p1""\t"$1}' DOF5p1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number10.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""DOF5p8""\t"$1}' DOF5p8-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number11.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""FRS9""\t"$1}' FRS9-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number12.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""HRPE""\t"$1}' HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number13.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""MYB""\t"$1}' MYB-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number18.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""OBP3""\t"$1}' OBP3-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number14.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""REM19""\t"$1}' REM19-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number15.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""TF3A""\t"$1}' TF3A-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number16.bed; 
awk '{print "MT""\t""VRN1""\t"$1}' VRN1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number17.bed; 

wc -l *-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-AllGenesNumbers.txt; 

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Motif""\t""Gene"};{print}' number100.bed > Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt; 
rm number*; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($3 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt; 

less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "3XHMGBOX1" > number1.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "AGL20" > number2.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "BPC1" > number3.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "CDF5" > number4.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF1p6" > number5.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF4p7" > number6.bed;

less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "FRS9" > number9.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "HRPE" > number10.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "MYB" > number11.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "OBP3" > number12.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "REM19" > number13.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TF3A" > number14.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "VRN1" > number15.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH122" > number16.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH130" > number17.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH80" > number18.bed; 


cat number* > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/MT/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances; 

awk '{print $1"\t""3XHMGBOX1"}' 3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number1.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""CDF5"}' CDF5-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number2.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number3.bed;

awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number17.bed; 


cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' number100.bed > MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.txt; rm number*;

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt DOF5p1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > DOF5p1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt DOF5p8-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > DOF5p8-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt FRS9-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > FRS9-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt MYB-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > MYB-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt OBP3-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > OBP3-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt REM19-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > REM19-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt TF3A-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > TF3A-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt VRN1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MOTIF"}' int.txt > VRN1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed; rm int.txt; 

cat *SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed > MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.txt; 
wc -l *-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed > MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 
cp MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > MT-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "MT""\t"$1}' MT-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > MT-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv MT-GenomicNumbers.txt MT-UpTHSsNumbers.txt MT-DownTHSsNumbers.txt MT-PromNumbers.txt MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt MT-AllGenesNumbers.txt MT-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

cat number* > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > SL-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp SL-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt;

cp SL-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt;

cp SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

awk '{print $1"\t""REM19"}' REM19-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number15.bed;

awk '{print $1"\t""VRN1"}' VRN1-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number17.bed; 


cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' number100.bed > SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.txt; rm number*; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/NearbyGenes;

cp SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 SL-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SL-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "SL""\t"$1}' SL-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > SL-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv SL-GenomicNumbers.txt SL-UpTHSsNumbers.txt SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt SL-PromNumbers.txt SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt SL-AllGenesNumbers.txt SL-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt SL-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt SL-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH122" > number16.bed;

less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH80" > number18.bed; 

cat number* > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances;

awk '{print $1"\t""AGL20"}' AGL20-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number3.bed;

awk '{print $1"\t""bHLH130"}' bHLH130-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number5.bed;

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' number100.bed > SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.txt; rm number*; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes;

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SP-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "SP""\t"$1}' SP-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > SP-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv SP-GenomicNumbers.txt SP-UpTHSsNumbers.txt SP-DownTHSsNumbers.txt SP-PromNumbers.txt SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt SP-AllGenesNumbers.txt SP-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

wc -l *-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-AllGenesNumbers.txt; 

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Motif""\t""Gene"};{print}' number100.bed > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt; 
rm number*; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($3 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt; 

less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "3XHMGBOX1" > number1.bed;

less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "BPC1" > number3.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "CDF5" > number4.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF1p6" > number5.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF4p7" > number6.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF5p1" > number7.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF5p8" > number8.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "FRS9" > number9.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "HRPE" > number10.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "MYB" > number11.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "OBP3" > number12.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "REM19" > number13.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TF3A" > number14.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "VRN1" > number15.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH122" > number16.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH130" > number17.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH80" > number18.bed; 


cat number* > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt;

cp OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > OS-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "OS""\t"$1}' OS-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' OS-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > OS-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv OS-GenomicNumbers.txt OS-UpTHSsNumbers.txt OS-DownTHSsNumbers.txt OS-PromNumbers.txt OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt OS-AllGenesNumbers.txt OS-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv OS-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt OS-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

rm number*; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($3 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt; 

less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "3XHMGBOX1" > number1.bed;

less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "BPC1" > number3.bed;

less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF1p6" > number5.bed;

less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "OBP3" > number12.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "REM19" > number13.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TF3A" > number14.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "VRN1" > number15.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH122" > number16.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH130" > number17.bed; 
less Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH80" > number18.bed; 


cat number* > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt;

cp MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt;

cp MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

wc -l *-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed > MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 
cp MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > MT-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "MT""\t"$1}' MT-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' MT-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > MT-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv MT-GenomicNumbers.txt MT-UpTHSsNumbers.txt MT-DownTHSsNumbers.txt MT-PromNumbers.txt MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt MT-AllGenesNumbers.txt MT-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv MT-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt MT-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt MT-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF1p6-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF1p6-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF4p7-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF4p7-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF5p1-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF5p1-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF5p8-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF5p8-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b FRS9-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > FRS9-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b HRPE-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > HRPE-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b MYB-SL-WG.bed  > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYB-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b OBP3-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > OBP3-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b REM19-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > REM19-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;

bedtools intersect -wa -a SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b VRN1-SL-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > VRN1-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 


wc -l *-SL-WG.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-GenomicNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-SL-WG-Proms.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-PromNumbers.txt;

wc -l *-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt;

cp SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 SL-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SL-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "SL""\t"$1}' SL-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SL-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > SL-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv SL-GenomicNumbers.txt SL-UpTHSsNumbers.txt SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt SL-PromNumbers.txt SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt SL-AllGenesNumbers.txt SL-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv SL-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt SL-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt SL-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other; 










####AdjustingUporDownValuesToReflectTHSsNotMotifNumbersInTHSs####

bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b 3XHMGBOX1-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > 3XHMGBOX1-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b CDF5-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > CDF5-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;

bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b bHLH122-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH122-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b bHLH130-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH130-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b bHLH80-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH80-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b BPC1-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > BPC1-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;

bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF4p7-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF4p7-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF5p1-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF5p1-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF5p8-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF5p8-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b FRS9-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > FRS9-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b HRPE-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > HRPE-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b MYB-SP-WG.bed  > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYB-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b OBP3-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > OBP3-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b REM19-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > REM19-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;

bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b VRN1-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > VRN1-SP-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b 3XHMGBOX1-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > 3XHMGBOX1-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b CDF5-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > CDF5-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;

bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b bHLH80-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH80-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b BPC1-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > BPC1-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF1p6-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF1p6-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF4p7-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF4p7-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF5p1-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF5p1-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b DOF5p8-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > DOF5p8-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b FRS9-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > FRS9-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a SP-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed -b HRPE-SP-WG.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > HRPE-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed;

wc -l *-SP-WG.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-GenomicNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-SP-WG-Proms.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-PromNumbers.txt;

wc -l *-SP-WG-DownTHSs.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-DownTHSsNumbers.txt;

rm number*;

less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "3XHMGBOX1" > number1.bed;

less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "BPC1" > number3.bed; 
less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "CDF5" > number4.bed; 
less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF1p6" > number5.bed;

less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "MYB" > number11.bed; 
less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "OBP3" > number12.bed; 
less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "REM19" > number13.bed; 
less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TF3A" > number14.bed; 
less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "VRN1" > number15.bed;

less Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH80" > number18.bed; 


cat number* > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list.txt > SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt;

cp SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes;
