wc -l *-SP-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCES.bed > SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 
cp SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt; 

mv *DISTANCES.* Distances; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SP-FINAL-SURFgenesList-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

awk '{print "SP""\t"$1}' SP-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file1.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file2.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file3.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-PromNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file4.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file5.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file6.txt; 
awk '{print $1}' SP-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk 'FNR<=18' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > file8.txt; awk 'FNR<=19' file8.txt > SP-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv SP-GenomicNumbers.txt SP-UpTHSsNumbers.txt SP-DownTHSsNumbers.txt SP-PromNumbers.txt SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt SP-AllGenesNumbers.txt SP-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv SP-Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt SP-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt SP-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 Other/OS-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 Other/OS-Motifs-FinalALLGenesListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > OS-FINAL-ALLGenes-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS;

#####MARpromoters#####

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/MARcoordinates; 

#SomeManualEditing
#Took out chr
#Remove the .# isoform annotation
#Fixed any instance of a line starting with 0, now starts with 1

awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Plus.txt Os_all_promoters.bed > Os-Plus-proms.bed; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Minus.txt Os_all_promoters.bed > Os-Minus-proms.bed; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2rn Os-Plus-proms.bed > file1.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file1.txt > file2.txt; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2n Os-Minus-proms.bed > file3.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file3.txt > file4.txt; 
cat file2.txt file4.txt | sort -k4,4 > OS-ATGpromoters.bed; 
rm file*.txt;


awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Plus.txt Mt_all_promoters.bed > MT-Plus-proms.bed; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Minus.txt Mt_all_promoters.bed > MT-Minus-proms.bed; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2rn MT-Plus-proms.bed > file1.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file1.txt > file2.txt; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2n MT-Minus-proms.bed > file3.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file3.txt > file4.txt; 
cat file2.txt file4.txt | sort -k4,4 > MT-ATGpromoters.bed; 
rm file*.txt; 


awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Plus.txt Sl_all_promoters.bed > Sl-Plus-proms.bed; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Minus.txt Sl_all_promoters.bed > Sl-Minus-proms.bed; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2rn Sl-Plus-proms.bed > file1.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file1.txt > file2.txt; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2n Sl-Minus-proms.bed > file3.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file3.txt > file4.txt; 
cat file2.txt file4.txt | sort -k4,4 > SL-ATGpromoters.bed; 
rm file*.txt;

awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Plus.txt Sp_all_promoters.bed > Sp-Plus-proms.bed; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} ($6 in a)' Minus.txt Sp_all_promoters.bed > Sp-Minus-proms.bed; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2rn Sp-Plus-proms.bed > file1.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file1.txt > file2.txt; 
sort -k4,4 -k2,2n Sp-Minus-proms.bed > file3.txt; 
sort -uk4,4 file3.txt > file4.txt; 
cat file2.txt file4.txt | sort -k4,4 > SP-ATGpromoters.bed; 
rm file*.txt;

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' OS.bed > OS-ATGpromoters.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' MT.bed > MT-ATGpromoters.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' SL.bed > SL-ATGpromoters.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' SP.bed > SP-ATGpromoters.bed;

#ERFHRPE was very weird
Had to lower the p-value cutoff -thresh 1e-3

ERFHRPE
allowing for only one mismatch (being the T) GCCGTC 0.000291

bHLH
allowing both CCACTTG 5.35e-05 and CAACTTG 0.000119

MYBcore 
with only 1 mismatch allowed the pvalue cutoff was 0.000289

TGHRPE
with one mismatch of either CGGTTT or AGGTTTT 0.000224

WRKYcore
with a mismatch in the last three, like TTGACTTC 8.32e-05 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs; 

fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0002 --o OS/bHLH bHLH.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0003 --o OS/ERFHRPE ERFHRPE.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0003 --o OS/MYBcore MYBcore.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0003 --o OS/TGHRPE TGHRPE.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0001 --o OS/WRKYcore WRKYcore.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Oryza_sativa.IRGSP-1.0.30.dna.genome.fa;

fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0003 --o MT/MYBcore MYBcore.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Mt4_JC.fa;

fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0002 --o SP/bHLH bHLH.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Spenn.fasta; 
fimo --max-stored-scores 100000000 --thresh 0.0003 --o SP/ERFHRPE ERFHRPE.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/Spenn.fasta;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/bHLH; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/bHLH-OS-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/ERFHRPE; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/ERFHRPE-OS-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/MYBcore; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/MYBcore-OS-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/TGHRPE; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/TGHRPE-OS-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/WRKYcore; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/WRKYcore-OS-WG.bed; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-OS-WG.bed -b OS-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH-OS-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-OS-WG.bed -b OS-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH-OS-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYBcore-OS-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > TGHRPE-OS-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > WRKYcore-OS-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-OS-WG.bed -b OS-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH-OS-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYBcore-OS-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > TGHRPE-OS-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > WRKYcore-OS-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 


wc -l *-OS-WG.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-GenomicNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-OS-WG-Proms.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-PromNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-OS-WG-UpTHSs.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-UpTHSsNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-OS-WG-DownTHSs.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-DownTHSsNumbers.txt; 


java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p bHLH-OS-WG-Proms.bed -a OS-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms.bed -a OS-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms.bed -a OS-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms.bed -a OS-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 
java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms.bed -a OS-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' bHLH-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 

mv *-GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Genes; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""3XHMGBOX1""\t"$1}' 3XHMGBOX1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number1.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""CDF5""\t"$1}' CDF5-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number2.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""AGL20""\t"$1}' AGL20-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number3.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""bHLH122""\t"$1}' bHLH122-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number4.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""bHLH130""\t"$1}' bHLH130-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number5.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""bHLH80""\t"$1}' bHLH80-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number6.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""BPC1""\t"$1}' BPC1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number7.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""DOF1p6""\t"$1}' DOF1p6-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number8.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""DOF4p7""\t"$1}' DOF4p7-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number9.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""DOF5p1""\t"$1}' DOF5p1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number10.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""DOF5p8""\t"$1}' DOF5p8-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number11.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""FRS9""\t"$1}' FRS9-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number12.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""HRPE""\t"$1}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number13.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""MYB""\t"$1}' MYB-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number18.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""OBP3""\t"$1}' OBP3-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number14.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""REM19""\t"$1}' REM19-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number15.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""TF3A""\t"$1}' TF3A-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number16.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""VRN1""\t"$1}' VRN1-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number17.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""bHLH""\t"$1}' bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number19.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""ERFHRPE""\t"$1}' ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number20.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""MYBcore""\t"$1}' MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number21.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""TGHRPE""\t"$1}' TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number22.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""WRKYcore""\t"$1}' WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number23.bed; 


wc -l *-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt; 

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Motif""\t""Gene"};{print}' number100.bed | sort -t, -nk2 > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list.txt; 
rm number*; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($3 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list.txt > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt; 

less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "3XHMGBOX1" | awk '{print "3XHMGBOX1""\t"$1}' > number1.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "AGL20" | awk '{print "AGL20""\t"$1}' > number2.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "BPC1" | awk '{print "BPC1""\t"$1}' > number3.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "CDF5" | awk '{print "CDF5""\t"$1}' > number4.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF1p6" | awk '{print "DOF1p6""\t"$1}' > number5.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF4p7" | awk '{print "DOF4p7""\t"$1}' > number6.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF5p1" | awk '{print "DOF5p1""\t"$1}' > number7.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "DOF5p8" | awk '{print "DOF5p8""\t"$1}' > number8.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "FRS9" | awk '{print "FRS9""\t"$1}' > number9.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "	HRPE	" | awk '{print "HRPE""\t"$1}' > number10.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "	MYB	" | awk '{print "MYB""\t"$1}' > number11.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "OBP3" | awk '{print "OBP3""\t"$1}' > number12.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "REM19" | awk '{print "REM19""\t"$1}' > number13.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TF3A" | awk '{print "TF3A""\t"$1}' > number14.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "VRN1" | awk '{print "VRN1""\t"$1}' > number15.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH122" | awk '{print "bHLH122""\t"$1}' > number16.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH130" | awk '{print "bHLH130""\t"$1}' > number17.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH80" | awk '{print "bHLH80""\t"$1}' > number18.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "	bHLH	" | awk '{print "bHLH""\t"$1}' > number19.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "ERFHRPE" | awk '{print "ERFHRPE""\t"$1}' > number20.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "MYBcore" | awk '{print "MYBcore""\t"$1}' > number21.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TGHRPE" | awk '{print "TGHRPE""\t"$1}' > number22.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "WRKYcore" | awk '{print "WRKYcore""\t"$1}' > number23.bed; 


cat number* | sort -t, -nk2 > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt; rm number*;  

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list.txt > OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > OS-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp OS-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Genes; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""bHLH""\t"$1}' bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number19.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""ERFHRPE""\t"$1}' ERFHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number20.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""MYBcore""\t"$1}' MYBcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number21.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""TGHRPE""\t"$1}' TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number22.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""WRKYcore""\t"$1}' WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number23.bed; 

wc -l *-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-JustThe5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt; 

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Motif""\t""Gene"};{print}' number100.bed | sort -t, -nk2 > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list.txt; 
rm number*; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($3 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list.txt > Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt; 


less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "bHLH" | awk '{print "bHLH""\t"$1}' > number19.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "ERFHRPE" | awk '{print "ERFHRPE""\t"$1}' > number20.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "MYBcore" | awk '{print "MYBcore""\t"$1}' > number21.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TGHRPE" | awk '{print "TGHRPE""\t"$1}' > number22.bed; 
less Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "WRKYcore" | awk '{print "WRKYcore""\t"$1}' > number23.bed; 

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list.txt > OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > OS-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp OS-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 OS-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > OS-FINAL-SURFgenesList-5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 OS-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 OS-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > OS-FINAL-SURFgenesList-JustThe5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
awk 'FNR<=23' OS-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print "OS""\t"$1}' > file1.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' OS-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file2.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' OS-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file3.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' OS-PromNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file4.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5motifs-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file5.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' OS-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file6.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' OS-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 1 | awk '{print $2}' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > OS-5motifs-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt;

mv OS-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt OS-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' bHLH-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' ERFHRPE-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > ERFHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt;

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' ERFHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > ERFHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' ERFHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > ERFHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' MYBcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > MYBcore-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' MYBcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYBcore-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed;

rm number*;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 MT-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 MT-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > MT-FINAL-SURFgenesList-5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt;

sort -k3 -n file3.txt > MT-FINAL-SURFgenesList-JustThe5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt;

awk 'FNR<=23' MT-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print "MT""\t"$1}' > file1.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' MT-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file2.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' MT-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file3.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' MT-PromNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file4.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5motifs-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file5.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' MT-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file6.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' MT-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 1 | awk '{print $2}' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > MT-5motifs-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv MT-GenomicNumbers.txt MT-UpTHSsNumbers.txt MT-DownTHSsNumbers.txt MT-PromNumbers.txt MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5motifs-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt MT-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt MT-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv MT-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt MT-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt MT-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other; 


















cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/bHLH; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/bHLH-SL-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/ERFHRPE; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/ERFHRPE-SL-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/MYBcore; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/MYBcore-SL-WG.bed; 
cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/TGHRPE; awk 'NR>1 {print $3"\t"$4"\t"$5}' fimo.txt > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/TGHRPE-SL-WG.bed;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-SL-WG.bed -b SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH-SL-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-SL-WG.bed -b SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-SL-WG.bed -b SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-SL-WG.bed -b SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-SL-WG.bed -b SL-AllGenes-PromCoords.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms.bed; rm int.bed; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-SL-WG.bed -b SL-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH-SL-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-SL-WG.bed -b SL-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > ERFHRPE-SL-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-SL-WG.bed -b SL-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYBcore-SL-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-SL-WG.bed -b SL-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > TGHRPE-SL-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-SL-WG.bed -b SL-UpInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > WRKYcore-SL-WG-UpTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-SL-WG.bed -b SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > bHLH-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-SL-WG.bed -b SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > ERFHRPE-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-SL-WG.bed -b SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYBcore-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-SL-WG.bed -b SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > TGHRPE-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-SL-WG.bed -b SL-DownInSUB-pval-merged50p.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > WRKYcore-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed; rm int.bed; 


wc -l *-SL-WG.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-GenomicNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-SL-WG-Proms.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-PromNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-SL-WG-UpTHSs.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-UpTHSsNumbers.txt; 
wc -l *-SL-WG-DownTHSs.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt;

java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms.bed -a SL-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes;

java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms.bed -a SL-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' bHLH-SL-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > bHLH-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed;

rm number*;

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list.txt > SL-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt;

cp SL-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

less Motifs-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "TGHRPE" | awk '{print "TGHRPE""\t"$1}' > number22.bed; 
less Motifs-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt | grep -c "WRKYcore" | awk '{print "WRKYcore""\t"$1}' > number23.bed; 

awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' Motifs-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list.txt > SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > SL-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp SL-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 

awk '{print}' Motifs-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-JustThe5motifs-list.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print "SL""\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > SL-JustThe5motifs-FinalAllGenesListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp SL-JustThe5motifs-FinalAllGenesListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/SL-JustThe5motifs-FinalAllGenesListOrganizedByGene.txt; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Distances;

awk '{print $1"\t""ERFHRPE"}' ERFHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number2.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""MYBcore"}' MYBcore-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number3.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""TGHRPE"}' TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number4.bed; 
awk '{print $1"\t""WRKYcore"}' WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed > number5.bed; 



cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' number100.bed > SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-DISTANCES.txt; rm number*;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 SL-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SL-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SL-FINAL-SURFgenesList-5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 SL-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SL-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SL-FINAL-SURFgenesList-JustThe5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SL-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print "SL""\t"$1}' > file1.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SL-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file2.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file3.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SL-PromNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file4.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5motifs-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file5.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SL-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file6.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SL-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 1 | awk '{print $2}' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > SL-5motifs-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv SL-GenomicNumbers.txt SL-UpTHSsNumbers.txt SL-DownTHSsNumbers.txt SL-PromNumbers.txt SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5motifs-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt SL-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt SL-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv SL-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt SL-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt SL-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other;

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' bHLH-SP-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > bHLH-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' ERFHRPE-SP-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > ERFHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' MYBcore-SP-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > MYBcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 

awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' bHLH-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > bHLH-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' bHLH-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' ERFHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > ERFHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' ERFHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > ERFHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' MYBcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > MYBcore-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' MYBcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYBcore-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 
awk 'NR>1 {print $7}' WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '!x[$0]++' > WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed; awk 'NR>1 {print $4}' WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-DISTANCES.bed; 

mv *-GENES.bed Genes; mv *-DISTANCES.bed Distances; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Genes;

rm number*;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
sort -t, -nk1 SP-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SP-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SP-FINAL-SURFgenesList-5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt;

sort -t, -nk1 SP-JustThe5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 SP-JustThe5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > SP-FINAL-SURFgenesList-JustThe5motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SP-GenomicNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print "SP""\t"$1}' > file1.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SP-UpTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file2.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SP-DownTHSsNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file3.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SP-PromNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file4.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5motifs-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file5.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SP-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 2 | awk '{print $1}' > file6.txt; 
awk 'FNR<=23' SP-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt | awk '{print $1"\t"$2}' | sort -k 1 | awk '{print $2}' > file7.txt; 

paste ListOfMotifs.txt file1.txt file2.txt file3.txt file4.txt file5.txt file6.txt file7.txt | awk 'BEGIN{print "Motif""\t""Species""\t""MotifsInGenome""\t""MotifsInUpTHSs""\t""MotifsInDownTHSs""\t""MotifsInPromoters""\t""MotifsInSURFPromoters""\t""NearestGenes""\t""NearestSURFGenes"};{print}' > SP-5motifs-MotifResults.txt; 
rm file*.txt; 


mv SP-GenomicNumbers.txt SP-UpTHSsNumbers.txt SP-DownTHSsNumbers.txt SP-PromNumbers.txt SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5motifs-PromoterMotifNumbers.txt SP-5motifs-AllGenesNumbers.txt SP-5motifs-SURFGenesNumbers.txt Other; 
mv SP-5motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt SP-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt SP-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt Other; 
















cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/Genes; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""HRPE""\t"$1}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number1.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""TGHRPE""\t"$1}' TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number2.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""MYB""\t"$1}' MYB-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number3.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""bHLH""\t"$1}' bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number4.bed; 
awk '{print "OS""\t""WRKYcore""\t"$1}' WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-GENES.bed > number5.bed; 

cat number* > number100.bed; awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Motif""\t""Gene"};{print}' number100.bed | sort -t, -nk2 > OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5SpecificMotifsForNetwork-list.txt; 
rm number*; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($3 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5SpecificMotifsForNetwork-list.txt > OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5SpecificMotifsForNetwork-list-SURFgenes.txt; 


awk '{a[$3]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5SpecificMotifsForNetwork-list.txt > OS-5MotifsForNetwork-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
cp OS-5MotifsForNetwork-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/Nnnumbers/OS-5MotifsForNetwork-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($1 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt OS-5MotifsForNetwork-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > OS-5MotifsForNetwork-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 
cp OS-5MotifsForNetwork-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/Nnnumbers/OS-5MotifsForNetwork-NumberOfMotifsInSURFGenes.txt; 

awk '{print}' OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5SpecificMotifsForNetwork-list-SURFgenes.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > OS-5MotifsForNetwork-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp OS-5MotifsForNetwork-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/Nnnumbers/OS-5MotifsForNetwork-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a HRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > HRPE-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYB-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > MYB-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed;
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > TGHRPE-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > bHLH-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > WRKYcore-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed;

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > HRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYB-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 


grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' HRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' MYB-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' TGHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' bHLH-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' WRKYcore-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' HRPE-OS-All-IDd.bed HRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > HRPE-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MYB-OS-All-IDd.bed MYB-OS-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > MYB-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' TGHRPE-OS-All-IDd.bed TGHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > TGHRPE-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' bHLH-OS-All-IDd.bed bHLH-OS-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > bHLH-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' WRKYcore-OS-All-IDd.bed WRKYcore-OS-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > WRKYcore-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 

cp *-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/Nnnumbers/PromMotifs-InOrOutTHS; 

awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' HRPE-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > HRPE-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' MYB-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > MYB-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' TGHRPE-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > TGHRPE-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' bHLH-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > bHLH-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' WRKYcore-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > WRKYcore-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 

rm *-JavaCondensed.txt; rm *-All-IDd.bed; 

cp *-OS-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/Nnnumbers/PromMotifs-InOrOutTHS; 






cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/MT/Coordinates; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a HRPE-MT-WG.bed -b MT-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > HRPE-MT-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYB-MT-WG.bed -b MT-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > MYB-MT-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed;
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-MT-WG.bed -b MT-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > TGHRPE-MT-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-MT-WG.bed -b MT-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > bHLH-MT-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-MT-WG.bed -b MT-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > WRKYcore-MT-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed;

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > HRPE-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/MYB-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYB-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 


grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' HRPE-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' MYB-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' TGHRPE-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' bHLH-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' WRKYcore-MT-JavaCondensed.txt; 

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' HRPE-MT-All-IDd.bed HRPE-MT-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > HRPE-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MYB-MT-All-IDd.bed MYB-MT-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > MYB-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' TGHRPE-MT-All-IDd.bed TGHRPE-MT-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > TGHRPE-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' bHLH-MT-All-IDd.bed bHLH-MT-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > bHLH-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' WRKYcore-MT-All-IDd.bed WRKYcore-MT-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > WRKYcore-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt; 

cp *-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/Nnnumbers/PromMotifs-InOrOutTHS; 

awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' HRPE-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > HRPE-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' MYB-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/MYB-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > MYB-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' TGHRPE-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > TGHRPE-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' bHLH-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > bHLH-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 
awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' WRKYcore-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > WRKYcore-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt; 

rm *-JavaCondensed.txt; rm *-All-IDd.bed; 

cp *-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromButNOTinTHS.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/Nnnumbers/PromMotifs-InOrOutTHS;

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/3XHMGBOX1-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > 3XHMGBOX1-MT-JavaCondensed.txt;

awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' 3XHMGBOX1-MT-All-IDd.bed 3XHMGBOX1-MT-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInPromInTHS"};{print}' > 3XHMGBOX1-MT-GenesWithMotifsInPromANDTHS.txt;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""HRPE"}' int.txt > HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MYB"}' int.txt > MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt;  
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""bHLH"}' int.txt > bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""TGHRPE"}' int.txt > TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' OS-SURFgenes.txt WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""WRKYcore"}' int.txt > WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 

cat *SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed > 1.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' 1.txt > OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5Networkmotifs-DISTANCES.txt; rm 1.txt; 


cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/MT/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""HRPE"}' int.txt > HRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt MYB-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MYB"}' int.txt > MYB-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt;  
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""bHLH"}' int.txt > bHLH-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""TGHRPE"}' int.txt > TGHRPE-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' MT-SURFgenes.txt WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""WRKYcore"}' int.txt > WRKYcore-MT-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 

cat *SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed > 1.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' 1.txt > MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5Networkmotifs-DISTANCES.txt; rm 1.txt; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SL/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""HRPE"}' int.txt > HRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt MYB-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MYB"}' int.txt > MYB-SL-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt;  
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt bHLH-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""bHLH"}' int.txt > bHLH-SL-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""TGHRPE"}' int.txt > TGHRPE-SL-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SL-SURFgenes.txt WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""WRKYcore"}' int.txt > WRKYcore-SL-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 

cat *SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed > 1.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' 1.txt > SL-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5Networkmotifs-DISTANCES.txt; rm 1.txt; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""HRPE"}' int.txt > HRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt MYB-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""MYB"}' int.txt > MYB-SP-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt;  
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt bHLH-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""bHLH"}' int.txt > bHLH-SP-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""TGHRPE"}' int.txt > TGHRPE-SP-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($7 in a)' SP-SURFgenes.txt WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > int.txt; awk '{print $4"\t""WRKYcore"}' int.txt > WRKYcore-SP-WG-Proms-Corr-SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed; rm int.txt; 

cat *SURFgenes-DISTANCESss.bed > 1.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' 1.txt > SP-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5Networkmotifs-DISTANCES.txt; rm 1.txt; 




For each of these, I added -2500 values to each motif to match it up to whatever was the highest occurring motif number, that way within the window of interest everything will be weighed the same

OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5Networkmotifs-DISTANCES-Normalized
Added that Normalized ending

The normalization does not do enough. It can definitely settle the levels, and it is very useful for this reason, but there is just no real good way to plot it with this approach


OS-SURF-5NetworkMotifs-Distances.pdf



#R
Values <- read.table("/Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes/OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-SURFgenes-5Networkmotifs-DISTANCES.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", check.names =F)
Values$Motif <- as.factor(Values$Motif)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(Values, aes(x=Distance, line=Motif, colour=Motif)) + xlim(-2000,500) + geom_density() + xlab("Distance from TSS") + theme_bw() + theme( panel.grid.major=element_blank(), panel.grid.minor=element_blank()) + ggtitle("THS Distance from TSS") + theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) + ylab("Density")

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 
awk '{print $4"\t""HRPE"}' HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-All-DISTANCESss.bed; 
awk '{print $4"\t""MYB"}' MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-All-DISTANCESss.bed;  
awk '{print $4"\t""bHLH"}' bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-All-DISTANCESss.bed; 
awk '{print $4"\t""TGHRPE"}' TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt  > TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-All-DISTANCESss.bed; 
awk '{print $4"\t""WRKYcore"}' WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr-All-DISTANCESss.bed; 

cat *All-DISTANCESss.bed > 1.txt; awk 'BEGIN{print "Distance""\t""Motif"};{print}' 1.txt > OS-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-All-5Networkmotifs-DISTANCES.txt; rm 1.txt;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates; 

awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' NearbyGenes/HRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > HRPE-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' NearbyGenes/MYB-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > MYB-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' NearbyGenes/TGHRPE-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' NearbyGenes/bHLH-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > bHLH-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3}' NearbyGenes/WRKYcore-OS-WG-Proms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph; 

bedtools sort -i HRPE-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph | bedtools merge > 1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t""100"}' 1.txt > 1.bedgraph;
bedtools sort -i MYB-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph | bedtools merge > 1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t""80"}' 1.txt > 2.bedgraph; 
bedtools sort -i TGHRPE-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph | bedtools merge > 1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t""60"}' 1.txt > 3.bedgraph; 
bedtools sort -i bHLH-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph | bedtools merge > 1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t""40"}' 1.txt > 4.bedgraph; 
bedtools sort -i WRKYcore-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph | bedtools merge > 1.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t""20"}' 1.txt > 5.bedgraph; 
cat 1.bedgraph 2.bedgraph 3.bedgraph 4.bedgraph 5.bedgraph > 6.txt; 
bedtools sort -i WRKYcore-OS-PromCoords.bedgraph | bedtools merge > 6.txt; awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t""20"}' 6.txt > 6.bedgraph; 
bedGraphToBigWig 6.bedgraph /Users/markobajic/Desktop/SUBEXP-DESeq-Results/ANNOTATION/OS-Chrom-sizes.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/VISUALIZING/OS-5motifs-PromCoords.bw; rm 1.txt; rm 6.txt; rm 6.bedgraph; 


















cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/VISUALIZING; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' MTgenesWith-HRPE-MYB-bHLH-WRKY.txt MT-SURFgenes-GeneBodyCoords.bed > MT-SURFgenes-ThoseWith-HRPE-MYB-bHLH-WRKY-GeneBodyCoords.bed; 






computeMatrix scale-regions -S HRPE-MT-PromCoords.bw bHLH-MT-PromCoords.bw MYB-MT-PromCoords.bw WRKYcore-MT-PromCoords.bw -R MT-SURFgenes-ThoseWith-HRPE-MYB-bHLH-WRKY-GeneBodyCoords.bed -a 0 -b 2000 -o MT-4motifs-GenesWithAll4motifs.gz; 
plotProfile -m MT-4motifs-GenesWithAll4motifs.gz --startLabel TSS --endLabel +500 --regionsLabel GenesWith4motifs --samplesLabel HRPE bHLH MYB WRKY --legendLocation upper-right --color blue red purple green --perGroup --outFileName MT-4motifs-GenesWithAll4motifs.png --yMin 0 --yMax 12; 
plotHeatmap -m MT-4motifs-GenesWithAll4motifs.gz --startLabel TSS --endLabel +500 --xAxisLabel bp --regionsLabel GenesWith4motifs --missingDataColor white --hclust 1 --samplesLabel HRPE bHLH MYB WRKY -out MT-4motifs-GenesWithAll4motifs-group.pdf --perGroup --colorMap Blues; 
plotHeatmap -m MT-4motifs-GenesWithAll4motifs.gz --startLabel TSS --endLabel +500 --xAxisLabel bp --regionsLabel GenesWith4motifs --missingDataColor white --hclust 1 --samplesLabel HRPE bHLH MYB WRKY -out MT-4motifs-GenesWithAll4motifs.pdf --colorList 'white,blue' 'white,red' 'white,purple' 'white,green';

awk '{print}' Motifs-MT-WG-Proms-ALL-Corr-5motifs-list.txt |awk -F '\t' 'NF>1{a[$3] = a[$3]"-"$2};END{for(i in a)print $1"\t"i"\t"a[i]}' > MT-All23Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 
cp MT-All23Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/MT-All23Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt; 



cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS;
sort -t, -nk1 Other/MT-5motifs-NumberOfMotifsInGenes.txt > file1.txt; 
sort -t, -nk2 MT-All23Motifs-FinalSURFListOrganizedByGene.txt > file2.txt; 
paste file1.txt file2.txt | column -s $'\t' -t | awk '{print $3"\t"$1"\t"$2"\t"$5}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Species""\t""Gene""\t""NumberOfMotifs""\t""Motifs"};{print}' > file3.txt; grep -e '	-' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/	-/	/g' file3.txt; 
sort -k3 -n file3.txt > MT-FINAL-AllGenes-All23Motifs-MotifsAndNumbers.txt; 
rm file*.txt;

bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/MARcoordinates/OS-ATGpromoters.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-MARproms.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-OS-WG.bed -b /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/MARcoordinates/OS-ATGpromoters.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > MYBcore-OS-WG-MARproms.bed; rm int.bed;

bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-OS-WG.bed -b /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/MARcoordinates/OS-ATGpromoters.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed > WRKYcore-OS-WG-MARproms.bed; rm int.bed; 

wc -l *-OS-WG-MARproms.bed > /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS/OS-MARprom-Numbers.txt; 

java -jar /Users/markobajic/Documents/Software/PeakAnnotator_Java_1.4/PeakAnnotator.jar -u TSS -p bHLH-OS-WG-MARproms.bed -a OS-Genes.bed -o NearbyGenes;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates/NearbyGenes; 

awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' bHLH-OS-WG-MARproms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > bHLH-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' ERFHRPE-OS-WG-MARproms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > ERFHRPE-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' MYBcore-OS-WG-MARproms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > MYBcore-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' TGHRPE-OS-WG-MARproms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > TGHRPE-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 
awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 <= 500) { print } }' WRKYcore-OS-WG-MARproms.tss.bed > int.txt; awk -F "\t" '{ if($4 >= -2000) { print } }' int.txt > WRKYcore-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt; rm int.txt; 

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/OS/Coordinates; 

bedtools intersect -wa -a bHLH-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > bHLH-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a ERFHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > ERFHRPE-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a MYBcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > MYBcore-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a TGHRPE-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > TGHRPE-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 
bedtools intersect -wa -a WRKYcore-OS-WG.bed -b OS-All.bed > int.bed; awk '!x[$0]++' int.bed | awk '{print $1"-"$2"-"$3}' > WRKYcore-OS-All-IDd.bed; rm int.bed; 


awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/bHLH-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt > bHLH-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/ERFHRPE-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt > ERFHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/MYBcore-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt > MYBcore-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/TGHRPE-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt > TGHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
awk '{print $1"\t"$2"\t"$3"\t"$1"-"$2"-"$3"\t"$7"\t"$4}' NearbyGenes/WRKYcore-OS-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt > WRKYcore-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 


grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' bHLH-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' ERFHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' MYBcore-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' TGHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 
grep -e 'chr' -rl . | xargs sed -i '' 's/chr//g' WRKYcore-OS-JavaCondensed.txt; 


awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' bHLH-OS-All-IDd.bed bHLH-OS-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInMARpromInTHS"};{print}' > bHLH-OS-GenesWithMotifsInMARpromANDTHS.txt; 
awk 'FNR==NR { a[$1]; next } ($4 in a)' ERFHRPE-OS-All-IDd.bed ERFHRPE-OS-JavaCondensed.txt | awk '{print $5}' | awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInMARpromInTHS"};{print}' > ERFHRPE-OS-GenesWithMotifsInMARpromANDTHS.txt;

cp *-SL-GenesWithMotifsInMARpromANDTHS.txt /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/NUMBERS-MARpromoters/PromMotifs-InOrOutTHS; 

awk 'NR==FNR{a[$1];next} !($7 in a)' bHLH-SL-GenesWithMotifsInMARpromANDTHS.txt NearbyGenes/bHLH-SL-WG-MARproms-Corr.txt | awk '{print $7}' |  awk '{a[$1]++}END{for(k in a)print k"\t"a[k]}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "Gene""\t""NumberMotifsInMARpromButNOTInTHS"};{print}' > bHLH-SL-GenesWithMotifsInMARpromButNOTinTHS.txt;

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/SP/Coordinates/NearbyGenes;

#Redoing the Plots with consistent colors to that of the rest of the paper. Also, made the bw the same levels

cd /Users/markobajic/Desktop/MotifEnrichment-NetworkApproach/tFIMO/WHOLEgenomeSEQs/VISUALIZING; 
computeMatrix scale-regions -S OS-HRPE-level-PromCoords.bw OS-bHLH-level-PromCoords.bw OS-MYB-level-PromCoords.bw OS-WRKYcore-level-PromCoords.bw -R OS-SURFgenes-GeneBodyCoords.bed -a 0 -b 250 -m 250 -o OS-4motifs-SURFGenes-level-smallerwindow.gz;
computeMatrix scale-regions -S MT-HRPE-level-PromCoords.bw MT-bHLH-level-PromCoords.bw MT-MYB-level-PromCoords.bw MT-WRKYcore-level-PromCoords.bw -R MT-SURFgenes-GeneBodyCoords.bed -a 0 -b 250 -m 250 -o MT-4motifs-SURFGenes-level-smallerwindow.gz;
computeMatrix scale-regions -S SL-HRPE-level-PromCoords.bw SL-bHLH-level-PromCoords.bw SL-MYB-level-PromCoords.bw SL-WRKYcore-level-PromCoords.bw -R SL-SURFgenes-GeneBodyCoords.bed -a 0 -b 250 -m 250 -o SL-4motifs-SURFGenes-level-smallerwindow.gz;
computeMatrix scale-regions -S SP-HRPE-level-PromCoords.bw SP-bHLH-level-PromCoords.bw SP-MYB-level-PromCoords.bw SP-WRKYcore-level-PromCoords.bw -R SP-SURFgenes-GeneBodyCoords.bed -a 0 -b 250 -m 250 -o SP-4motifs-SURFGenes-level-smallerwindow.gz;

 
plotHeatmap -m OS-4motifs-SURFGenes-level-smallerwindow.gz --startLabel TSS --endLabel TES --xAxisLabel bp --regionsLabel SURFgenes --missingDataColor white --hclust 1 --samplesLabel HRPE bHLH MYB WRKY -out OS-4motifs-SURFGenes-group-level-smallerwindow.pdf --legendLocation upper-right --perGroup --colorMap Blues --dpi 500;

less SL-HAIRY-UP-Annotated.txt | grep -c "intron" | awk '{print $1"\t""Intron"}' > number3.txt; 
less SL-HAIRY-UP-Annotated.txt | grep -c "TTS" | awk '{print $1"\t""Downstream"}' > number4.txt; 
less SL-HAIRY-UP-Annotated.txt | grep -c "Intergenic" | awk '{print $1"\t""Intergenic"}' > number5.txt; 
cat number1.txt number2.txt number3.txt number4.txt number5.txt | awk '{print $2"\t"$1}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "GenomicFeature""\t""Number"};{print}' > SL-HAIRY-UP-Numbers.txt; 
rm number*.txt; 

less SL-HAIRY-DOWN-Annotated.txt | grep -c "promoter-TSS" | awk '{print $1"\t""Promoter"}' > number1.txt; 
less SL-HAIRY-DOWN-Annotated.txt | grep -c "exon" | awk '{print $1"\t""Exon"}' > number2.txt; 
less SL-HAIRY-DOWN-Annotated.txt | grep -c "intron" | awk '{print $1"\t""Intron"}' > number3.txt; 
less SL-HAIRY-DOWN-Annotated.txt | grep -c "TTS" | awk '{print $1"\t""Downstream"}' > number4.txt; 
less SL-HAIRY-DOWN-Annotated.txt | grep -c "Intergenic" | awk '{print $1"\t""Intergenic"}' > number5.txt; 
cat number1.txt number2.txt number3.txt number4.txt number5.txt | awk '{print $2"\t"$1}' | awk 'BEGIN{print "GenomicFeature""\t""Number"};{print}' > SL-HAIRY-DOWN-Numbers.txt; 
rm number*.txt; 


less SL-ROOT-ALL-Annotated.txt | grep -c "promoter-TSS" | awk '{print $1"\t""Promoter"}' > number1.txt; 
less SL-ROOT-ALL-Annotated.txt | grep -c "exon" | awk '{print $1"\t""Exon"}' > number2.txt; 
less SL-ROOT-ALL-Annotated.txt | grep -c "intron" | awk '{print $1"\t""Intron"}' > number3.txt; 
less SL-ROOT-ALL-Annotated.txt | grep -c "TTS" | awk '{print $1"\t""Downstream"}' > number4.txt; 
less SL-ROOT-ALL-Annotated.txt | grep -c "Intergenic" | awk '{print $1"\t""Intergenic"}' > number5.txt;

rm number*.txt;

less SL-ROOT-UP-Annotated.txt | grep -c "exon" | awk '{print $1"\t""Exon"}' > number2.txt;
